 ssip Semosavlebis samsaxuris 


sakasacio saCivrebi ar akmayofile


ben saqarTvelos administraciuli 


saproceso kodeqsis 34-e muxlis me-3 nawilis moTxovnebs. 


     sakasacio sasamarTlos miaC


nia, rom mocemuli saqme ar aris 


mniSvnelovani samarTlis ganviTareb


isa da erTgvarovani sasamarTlo 


praqtikis CamoyalibebisaTvis da 


saapelacio sasamarTloSi saqme 


ganxilulia saproceso darRvevebis gareSe. 


     sakasacio sasamarTlos miaC


nia, rom mocemul SemTxvevaSi ar 


arsebobs saapelacio sasamarTlos 


mier gamoyenebuli


 saproceso da 


materialuri samarTlis normebis


 ganmartebisa da samarTlis 


ganviTarebis mizniT, sakasacio sasa


marTlos mier zogadi mniSvnelobis 


mqone (konkretulTan erTad) saxe


lmZRvanelosa da sarekomendacio 


gadawyvetilebis gamotanis 


faqtobrivi saWiroeba. 


 sakasacio 


sasamarTlos 


mosazrebiT


, mocemul saqmes ar gaaCnia   


principuli mniSvneloba sasamarTlo praqtikisaTvis. 


    aRniSnulidan gamomdinare, sakasacio sasamarTlos miaCnia, rom 


mocemul SemTxvevaSi ar arsebobs Sps `...~, saqarTvelos finansTa

muxlis me-3 nawiliT reglamentirebul


i arc erTi safuZveli, ris gamoc

samsaxuris sakasacio saCivrebs uari unda eTqvaT gansaxilvelad 


daSvebaze. 


   amasTan, sakasacio palata miuTiTebs saqarTvelos samoqalaqo 


saproceso kodeqsis 401-e muxlis 


me-4 nawilze da aRniSnavs, rom 


miTiTebuli muxlis Sesabamisad: 


,,Tu sakasacio saCivari dauSveblad 


iqneba miCneuli, pirs daubrundeba mi


s mier gadaxdili saxelmwifo baJis 


70%~. aRniSnuli muxlidan gamomdinare da imis gaTvaliswinebiT, rom 


Sps `...~ sakasacio saCivari dauSv


eblad iqna miCneuli, sakasacio 


sasamarTlos miaCnia, rom Sps `...~ un


da daubrundes sakasacio saCivarze 


gadaxdili saxelmwifo baJis (8


000 laris) 70% (5600 lari).

         a R w e r i 


l o b i T i   n a w i l i: 


 2010 wlis 11 oqtombers Tb


ilisis saqalaqo sasamarTlos 


administraciul saqmeTa ko


legias sarCeliT mimarTa g. g-rem mopasuxis–


saqarTvelos Tavdacvis saministros mimarT.  


 mosarCele sarCeliT iTxovda mopasuxes dakisreboda 1998-2000 


wlebis saxelfaso davalianebis


 1381 laris anazRaureba. 


 Tbilisis saqalaqo sasamarTlos 


administraciul sa


qmeTa kolegiis 


2010 wlis 12 noembris gadawyvetilebiT g. g-res sarCeli dakmayofilda 


nawilobriv; saqarTvelos Tavdacvis saministros g. g-res sasargeblod 


daekisra 1998 wlis IX, X, XI, XII,


 1999 wlis VI, VII, VIII, IX, X, 


XI, 2000 wlis IV, V, VI, X, Tveeb


is xelze gasacemi Tanamdebobrivi 


sargos -471 larisa da 89 TeTris


 odenobiT anazRaureba; mosarCeles 


kvebis kompensaciis, jildos, mate


rialuri daxmarebis anazRaurebaze 


eTqva uari xandazmulobis gamo.

         a R w e r i 


l o b i T i   n a w i l i: 


 2010 wlis 21 aprils zestafonis raionul sasamarTlos sarCeliT 


mimarTa ssip `adamianiT vaWrobis (trefikingis) msxverplTa, 


dazaralebulTa dacvisa da daxmarebis saxelmwifo fondma~ mopasuxis– 


g. g-Zis mimarT. 


mosarCele sarCeliT iTxovda saqa


rTvelos Tavdacvis saministros 


dakisreboda mosarCelis sasargeblod 


zianis anazRaureba 3683,68 laris 


odenobiT. 


zestafonis raionuli sasamarTlos 20


10 wlis 1 ivnisis ganCinebiT g. 


g-Ze Seicvala saTanado mopasuxiT, 


saqarTvelos Tavdacvis saministroTi, 


Sesabamisad, amave ganCinebiT saqme 


gansaxilvelad gadaegzavna Tbilisis 


saqalaqo sasamarTlos samoqa


laqo saqmeTa kolegias.  


Tbilisis saqalaqo sasamarTlos sam


oqalaqo saqmeTa kolegiaSi saqmis 


ganxilvisas mopasuxe saqarTvelos Ta


vdacvis saministrom iSuamdgomla, 


raTa mosarCele_ssip `adamianiT va


Wrobis (trefikingis) msxverplTa, 


dazaralebulTa dacvisa da daxmarebis


 saxelmwifo fondi~ Secvliliyo 


saTanado mosarCeliT-aWaris avtono


miuri respublikis finansTa da 


ekonomikis saministroTi. aRniSn


ul Suamdgomlobas daeTanxma ssip 


`adamianiT vaWrobis (trefikingis) 


msxverplTa, dazaralebulTa dacvisa 


da daxmarebis saxelmwifo fondi~ 


da misi Secvla moxda saTanado 


mosarCeliT_ aWaris avtonomiuri respublikis finansTa da ekonomikis 


saministroTi. 


 Tbilisis saqalaqo sasamarTlos sa


moqalaqo saqmeTa kolegiis 2010 


wlis 15 oqtombris ganCinebiT saqme aWaris avtonomiuri respublikis 


finansTa da ekonomikis samini


stros sarCelisa gamo mopasuxe 


saqarTvelos Tavdacvis saministros mima


rT zianis anazRaurebis Taobaze, 


231 


gansjadobiT gansaxilvelad gadaec


a Tbilisis saqalaqo sasamarTlos 


administraciul saqm


eTa kolegias.

administraciul sa


qmeTa kolegiis 


2010 wlis 24 noembris gadawyvetilebiT aWaris avtonomiuri 


respublikis finansTa da ekonomikis


 saministros sarCeli dakmayofilda; 


saqarTvelos Tavdacvis saministros 


daevala mosarCelis sasargeblod 


zianis anazRaureba 3683


,68 laris odenobiT.

ministraciul saqmeTa palatam  


    Semdegi SemadgenlobiT: 


nino qadagiZe


(Tavmjdomare, momxsenebeli),


         mosamarTleebi:


nugzar sxirtlaZe


, 


levan murusiZe


saqarTvelos administraciuli sapr


oceso kodeqsis pirveli muxlisa 


da 34-e muxlis me-3 nawilis safu


Zvelze, zepiri ganxilvis gareSe, 


Seamowma g. k-Zis sakasacio saCivris


 dasaSvebobis safuZvlebis arseboba 


Tbilisis saapelacio sasamarTlo


s administraciul 


saqmeTa palatis 


2010 wlis 16 noembris ganCinebaze.   


         a R w e r i 


l o b i T i   n a w i l i: 


 2009 wlis 17 ivliss Tbilisis saqalaqo sasamarTlos 


administraciul saqmeTa kolegias sarC


eliT mimarTa g. k-Zem, mopasuxis–


q. Tbilisis meriis mimarT.  


 mosarCele sarCeliT iTxovda fizikuri da kerZo samarTlis 


iuridiuli pirebis mflobelobaSi 


(sargeblobaSi) arsebul miwis 


nakveTebze sakuTrebis uflebis aR


iarebis komisiis 2009 wlis 15 


aprilis 3119 oqmis baTilad cnoba


s, TbilisSi, ... quCa #32-is 


mimdebared ganTavsebuli 


miwis nakveTis dakanonebaz


e g. k-ZisaTvis uaris 


Tqmis nawilSi; mosarCele aseve iTxo


vda fizikuri da kerZo samarTlis 


iuridiuli pirebis mflobelobaSi 


(sargeblobaSi) arsebul miwis 


nakveTebze sakuTrebis uflebis aR


iarebis komisias davaleboda q. 


TbilisSi, ... quCa #32-is mimdebar


ed ganTavsebul 1092 kv.m. miwis 


nakveTsa da masTan uZravad dakavSirebul Senoba-nagebobaze sakuTrebis 


uflebis aRiareba da sakuTrebis


 mowmobis, aseve damowmebuli 


sakadastro azomviTi naxazis gacema


, sxva sakadastro monacemebTan 


erTad, sakuTrebaaRiarebuli miwis 


nakveTisa da Senoba-nagebobis 


gansazRvrisa da farTobis miTiTebiT.  


 2010 wlis 22 ivnisis saoqmo ga


nCinebiT mosarCelis TanxmobiT 


arasaTanado mopasuxis q. Tbilisis 


meriis nacvlad saqmeSi mopasuxed 


CaerTo q. Tbilisis sakrebulos 


fizikuri da kerZo samarTlis 


iuridiuli pirebis mflobelobaSi 


(sargeblobaSi) arsebul miwis 


nakveTebze sakuTrebis uf


lebis aRiarebis komisia. 


 Tbilisis saqalaqo sasamarTlos 


administraciul saqmeTa kolegiis 


2010 wlis 23 ivnisis gadawyve


tilebiT g. k-Zis sarCeli ar 


dakmayofilda.  


235 


   miTiTebuli gadawyvetileba saap


elacio wesiT gaasaCivra g. k-Zem.  


      apelanti 


saapelacio 


saCivriT iTxovda gasaCivrebuli 


gadawyvetilebis gauqmebasa da 


misi sasarCelo moTxovnis srulad 


dakmayofilebas. 


      Tbilisis saapelacio 


sasamarTlos admini


straciul saqmeTa 


palatis 2010 wlis 16 noembris ganCi


nebiT g. k-Zis saapelacio saCivari 


ar dakmayofilda; ucvlelad darCa Tbilisis saqalaqo sasamarTlos 


administraciul saqmeT


a kolegiis 2010 wlis 23 ivnisis gadawyvetileba.  


      aRniSnuli ga


nCineba sakasacio wesiT 


gaasaCivra g. k-Zem. 


  kasatori sakasacio saCivriT 


iTxovda gasaCivrebuli ganCinebis 


gauqmebasa da saqmeze axali gadawyvetilebis miRebiT mosarCelis 


sasarCelo moTxovnis srulad dakmayofilebas.   


     saqarTvelos 


uzenaesi 


sa


samarTlos administraciul saqmeTa 


palatis 2011 wlis 31 martis ganCinebiT administraciuli saproceso 


kodeqsis 34-e muxlis me-3 nawi


lis Sesabamisad, dasaSvebobis 


Sesamowmeblad warmoebaSi iqna miRe


buli g. k-Zis sakasacio saCivari. 


s a m o t i v a c i o 


   n a w i l i : 


     sakasacio sasamarTlo gaecno


 gasaCivrebul ganCinebas, g. k-Zis 


sakasacio saCivars, Seamowma saqarTve


los uzenaesi sasamarTlos praqtika 


mocemul saqmesTan mimarTeb


aSi da miaCnia, rom g. 


k-Zis sakasacio saCivari 


ar akmayofilebs saqarTvelos admini


straciuli saproceso kodeqsis 34-e 


muxlis me-3 nawilis moTxovnebs. 


     sakasacio sasamarTlos miaC


nia, rom mocemuli saqme ar aris 


mniSvnelovani samarTlis ganviTareb


isa da erTgvarovani sasamarTlo 


praqtikis CamoyalibebisaTvis da 


saapelacio sasamarTloSi saqme 


ganxilulia saproceso darRvevebis gareSe. 


     sakasacio sasamarTlos miaC


nia, rom mocemul SemTxvevaSi ar 


arsebobs saapelacio sasamarTlos 


mier gamoyenebuli


 saproceso da 


materialuri samarTlis normebis


 ganmartebisa da samarTlis 


ganviTarebis mizniT, sakasacio sasa


marTlos mier zogadi mniSvnelobis 


mqone (konkretulTan erTad) saxe


lmZRvanelosa da sarekomendacio 


gadawyvetilebis gamotanis 


faqtobrivi saWiroeba. 


 sakasacio 


sasamarTlos 


mosazreb


iT, mocemul saqmes ar gaaCnia 


araviTari principuli mniSvneloba 


sasamarTlo praqtikisaTvis, xolo 


sakasacio saCivars _ warmatebis perspeqtiva. 


    aRniSnulidan gamomdinare, sakasacio sasamarTlos miaCnia, rom 


mocemul SemTxvevaSi ar arsebobs


 g. k-Zis sakasacio saCivris 


dasaSvebobis saqarTvelo


s administraciuli saproceso kodeqsis 34-e 


236 


muxlis me-3 nawiliT reglamentirebul


i arc erTi safuZveli, ris gamoc 


g. k-Zis sakasacio saCivars uari un


da eTqvas gansaxilvelad daSvebaze. 


   amasTan, sakasacio palata miuTiTebs saqarTvelos samoqalaqo 


saproceso kodeqsis 401-e muxlis 


me-4 nawilze da aRniSnavs, rom 


miTiTebuli muxlis Sesabamisad: 


,,Tu sakasacio saCivari dauSveblad 


iqneba miCneuli, pirs daubrundeba mi


s mier gadaxdili saxelmwifo baJis 


70%~. aRniSnuli muxlidan gamomdinare 


da imis gaTvaliswinebiT, rom g. 


k-Zis sakasacio saCivari dauSveb


lad iqna miCneuli, sakasacio 


sasamarTlos miaCnia, rom g. k-Zes un


da daubrundes sakasacio saCivarze 


gadaxdili saxelmwifo baJis (3


00 laris) 70% (210 lari). 


s a r e z o l u c i 


o   n a w i l i : 


sakasacio sasamarTlom ixelmZRvanela saqarTvelos 


administraciuli saproceso kodeqsis pirveli muxlis me-2 nawiliT,  


samoqalaqo saproceso kodeqsis 401-e muxliT da


d  a  a  d  g  i  n  a : 


1.


g. k-Zes uari eTqvas sakasacio sa


Civris gansaxilvelad daSvebaze; 


2.


g. k-Zes daubrundes sakasacio saCivarze gadaxdili saxelmwifo 


baJis (300 laris) 70% _ 210 lari. angariSidan: sabiujeto 


Semosavlebis saxazino kodi – 3


00773150, gadaxdis daniSnuleba – 


saxelmwifo baJi saqarTvelos uzena


es sasamarTloSi gansaxilveli 


saqmeebisaTvis, mimRebi – erTiani an


gariSi arasagadasaxado (Tbilisi), 


xazinis erTiani angariSis #200122900,


 saxelmwifo xazina, bankis kodi 


– 220101222; 


3.


sakasacio sasamarTlos ganCineba sabolooa da ar saCivrdeba.

 2010 wlis 30 ivniss Tbil


isis saqalaqo sasamarTlos 


administraciul saqmeTa ko


legias sarCeliT mima


rTa saqarTvelos ...  


gaerTianebam mopasuxis–q. Tbilis


is sakrebulos fizikuri da kerZo 


samarTlis iuridiuli pirebis mfl


obelobaSi (sargeblobaSi) arsebul 


miwis nakveTebze sakuTreb


is uflebis aRiarebis komisiisa da q. Tbilisis 


meriis urbanuli dagegmareb


is samsaxuris mimarT.

iuridiuli pirebis mflobelobaSi 


(sargeblobaSi) arsebul miwis 


nakveTebze sakuTrebis uflebis aRiare


bis komisiis  2008 wlis 7 martis 


gadawyvetilebis (oqmi #11) baTilad cnobas im nawilSi, romliTac q.

urbanuli dagegmarebis samsaxuris

brZanebis baTilad cnobas.

qarTvelos profesiuli kavSirebis

 saproceso da 


materialuri samarTlis normebis


 ganmartebisa da samarTlis 


ganviTarebis mizniT, sakasacio sasa

mqone (konkretulTan erTad) saxe


lmZRvanelosa da sarekomendacio 


gadawyvetilebis gamotanis 


faqtobrivi saWiroeba.

l o b i T i   n a w i l i: 


 2010 wlis 31 agvistos Tbilisis saqalaqo sasamarTlos 


administraciul saqmeTa 


kolegias sarCeliT mimarTa z. x-Svilma, 


mopasuxis–q. Tbilisis sakrebulo


s fizikuri da kerZo samarTlis 


iuridiuli pirebis mflobelobaSi 


(sargeblobaSi) arsebul miwis 


nakveTebze sakuTrebis uflebis 


aRiarebis komisiis mimarT.  


    mosarCele sarCeliT iTxovda fizikuri da kerZo samarTlis 


iuridiuli pirebis mflobelobaSi 


(sargeblobaSi) arsebul miwis 


nakveTebze sakuTrebis uflebis aRiare


bis komisiis 2010 wlis 8 ivnisis 


#206  oqmis 37-e sakiTxis baTilad cnobas; mosarCele aseve iTxovda 


oqroyanaSi, ... q. #40-42-is mimdebared


 arsebul 871 kv.m. miwis nakveTze 


sakuTrebis uflebis aRiarebas.

administraciul saqmeTa kolegiis 


2010 wlis 22 seqtembris gadawyvetilebiT z. x-Svilis sarCeli ar 


dakmayofilda.

aapelacio wesiT gaasaCivra z. x-

avda saministros

organos. aRniSnuli kanonis me-2 muxlis

devnilis statusis maZieblis, devnilad cnobisa da devnilis statusis 


miniWebaze uaris Tqmis Sesaxeb gada


wyvetileba miiReboda gancxadebis 


wardgenidan erTi Tvis vadaSi.   


saqalaqo sasamarTlom ar gaiziara mopasuxe _ administraciuli 


organos mosazreba im sakiTxTan dakavSirebiT, rom g. c-Svilis gancxadeba 


ar akmayofilebda kanonmdeblis mier


 dadgenil minimalur moTxovnebs, ris 


gamoc ar arsebobda administraciuli


 warmoebis Catarebis aucilebloba.

sawinaaRmdegod, saqalaqo sasamarTlom miuTiTa 


saqarTvelos zogadi administraciuli ko


deqsis 83-e muxlze da ganmarta, 


rom Tu ganmcxadebeli administraciul

dgenda kanoniT an

dokuments an sxva informacias,


 rac aucilebeli iyo saqmis

gano ganmcxadebels ganusazRvravda 


vadas, romlis ganmavlobaSi mas unda waredgina damatebiTi dokumenti an

edi kanonmdeblobis Tanaxmad, ukve

buli piris _ devnilis statusi.

s administraciul

legiis 2010 wlis 10 seqtembris 


gadawyvetileba. 


saapelacio sasamarTlom srulad ga


iziara saqalaqo sasamarTlos 


gadawyvetilebiT dadgenili saqmis 


faqtobrivi garemoebebi, maTi 


samarTlebrivi Sefasebebi da saqarTve


los samoqalaqo saproceso kodeqsis 


390-e muxlis me-3 nawilis `g~ qvepun


qtis safuZvelze miuTiTa maTze.

s administraciul 


saqmeTa palatis 


2010 wlis 21 dekembris ganCineba saka


sacio wesiT gaasaCivra g. c-Svilma. 


kasatorma aRniSna, rom 2006 wlis 6 aprils ,,iZulebiT 


gadaadgilebul pirTa-devnilTa Sesaxeb”

me-9 punqtSi Sesuli cvlilebis Tana


xmad, am kanonis pirvel muxlSi 


gansazRvruli mizezebis gamo mosa


xleobis masobrivi da eqstremaluri 


gadaadgilebis dros devnilis statusis miniWeba xdeboda dauyovnebliv.

gansakuTrebuli SemTxveva, rodesa


c iZulebiT gadaadgilebul pirTa 


devnilobaSi eWvi ar arsebobda da sa

ayvana. miTiTebuli muxliT dadgeni

dauyovnebliv mieniWebina devnilis st


atusi pirisTvis, romelic iZulebiT 


gadaadgilda samxedro Tavdasxmis 


gamo mosaxleobis eqstremaluri da 


masobrivi gadaadgilebis dros.  


kasatoris ganmartebiT, saministro


saTvis cnobili iyo g. c-Svilis 


devnilobis Sesaxeb. kasatoris mosa


zrebiT, saministro


s mier kanoniT 


dakisrebuli valdebulebis Seusrule


blobis gamo g. c-Svils miadga 


materialuri ziani, kerZod, mas da


uyovnebliv ar mieniWa devnilis 


statusi da Sesabamisad, ar da


eniSna saxelmwifo Semweoba.  


amdenad, kasatorma gasaCivrebuli 


ganCinebis gauqmeba da axali 


gadawyvetilebiT sarCelis srulad da


kmayofileba, kerZod, saqarTvelos 


zogadi administraciuli kodeqsis 208-e muxlis safuZvelze,

miyenebuli materialuri zianis _ 


miuRebeli Semweobis Tanxis 2008 


wlis seqtembridan anazRaureba 


moiTxova.

administraciul saqmeTa palatis

uli g. c-Svilis sakasacio saCivari.

los administraciul saqmeTa palatis

daswrebiT 2011 wlis 28 aprils 13:00 saaTze.

miniWebuli aqvs devnilis statusi da igi iRebs devnilisaTvis

lad miiCnevs, rom 2010 wlis 20 


aprils g. c-Svilma gancxadebiT

gancxadebasTan dakavSirebiT admini


straciuli warmoeba ar Caatara da 


gancxadeba upasuxod datova (t. I, s.f. 64-66).

dakmayofilebaze (t. I, s.f. 76-82).

sakasacio sasamarTlo miiCnevs, 


rom saqalaqo sasamarTlos mier 


dakmayofilebul nawilSi g. c-Svilis sarCeli saqarTvelos 


administraciuli saproceso kodeqsis 23-e muxliT gaTvaliswinebul 


mavaldebulebel sarCels warmoadgenda. sagulisxmoa, rom sasamarTlo 


procesebze sarCelis dazusteba an 


transformireba ar momxdara da 


saqarTvelos administraciuli sapr


oceso kodeqsis 22-e muxliT 


gaTvaliswinebuli SecilebiTi 


sarCeli ar wardgenila.  


sakasacio sasamarTlo ganmartavs, rom saqarTvelos 


administraciuli saproceso kode


qsis 33-e muxli awesrigebs 


mavaldebulebeli sarCelis (23-e muxlis) safuZvelze miRebul 


sasamarTlo gadawyvetilebebs. sasa


marTlo iRebs gadawyvetilebas, 


romliTac is avalebs ad


ministraciul organos, gamosces moTxovnili 


administraciul-samarTlebrivi aqti, 


Tu administraciul-samarTlebrivi 


aqtis gamocemaze uaris Tqma ukanon


oa an Tu administraciulma organom 


ar gamosca aqti kanoniT gaTvaliswineb


ul vadaSi (szak-is me-100 da 183-e 


muxlebi), ramac Selaxa an daarRvia 


mosarCelis uflebebi da kanonieri 


interesebi. miTiTebuli normis mixe


dviT, sarCeli dasabuTebulia, Tu 


dadgindeba aqtis gamocemaze administraciuli organos uaris 


kanonSeusabamoba, an misi gamocemis 


vadebis darRveva, rac pirdapir da 


uSualo (individualur) zians ayenebs 


mosarCelis kanonier uflebas an 


interess. sarCelis dasabuTebulobi


s Semowmebisas sasamarTlo aseve 


arkvevs, Tu administraciuli 


organos uariT ramdenad Seilaxa 


mosarCelis iseTi kanonieri ufle


bebi, romlebic gamomdinareoben 


materialuri samarTlis normeb


idan. amasTan, sasamarTlom 


administraciul-samarTlebrivi aqtis gamocemis Taobaze sarCelis 


dasabuTebulobis Semowmebisas unda 


gamoikvlios, moqmedebda Tu ara  


270 


administraciuli organo diskreciuli


 uflebamosilebis farglebSi; Tu 


administraciul-samarTlebrivi aqti, 


romlis gamocemis davaldebulebasac 


iTxovs mosarCele, moqceulia admi


nistraciuli organos diskreciuli 


uflebamosilebis farglebSi, sasama


rTlo uflebamosilia, Seamowmos 


Secdomis arseboba diskreciul ufleba


mosilebaSi, aseve Seamowmos, Tu 


ramdenad dasabuTebulia am uflebamosile


bis gamoyeneba. im SemTxvevaSi, Tu 


sasamarTlo daadgens sask-is 23


-e muxliT aRZruli sarCelis 


dasabuTebulobis im wanamZRvrebs, ra


c dadgenilia sask-is 33-e muxliT 


(aqtis gamocemaze uaris ukanonoba 


an Secdoma diskreciaSi), mas amave 


muxlis mixedviT SeuZlia admini


straciul organos gadawyvetilebiT 


daavalos, gamosces administraciul


-samarTlebrivi aqti an TviTon 


moawesrigos sadavo sakiTxi. amasTan, 


sasamarTlo mxolod im SemTxvevaSia 


uflebamosili, moawesrigos sadavo sa


kiTxi, Tu aRniSnuli iTvaliswinebs 


individualuri administraciul-samarT


lebrivi aqtis gamocemas da ar 


saWiroebs saqmis garemoebaTa damatebiT 


da arsebiT gamokvlevas. amasTanave, 


sakiTxi ar miekuTvneba admini


straciuli organos diskreciul 


uflebamosilebas.  


sakasacio sasamarTlo miiCnevs, ro


m mocemul SemTxvevaSi saqalaqo 


sasamarTlom daadgina, rom admini


straciuli organo


s uari aqtis 


gamocemis Taobaze iyo kanonSeusabamo, rac pirdapir da uSualo 


(individualur) zians ayenebda mosarCel


is kanonier uflebas da interess. 


amasTan, saqalaqo sasamarTlo ar iy


o uflebamosili Tavad moewesrigebina 


sadavo sakiTxi, vinaidan, aRniSnuli


 administraciul organos diskreciul 


uflebamosilebas warmoadgenda da saqmis garemoebaTa damatebiT da 


arsebiT gamokvlevas saWiroebda.

saqarTvelos administraciuli sapr


oceso kodeqsis 23-e muxlis

g. c-SvilisaTvis devnilis statusis miniWebasTan dakavSirebiT axali 


individualur administraciul-samarT


lebrivi aqtis gamocema daavala.

damatebiT miuTiTebs ,,iZulebiT 


gadaadgilebul pirTa devnilad cnobis

devnilTa registraciis wesis,

devnilis mowmobis formis, mowmobis debulebisa da anketis formis

olvilTa da gansaxlebis ministris

ara gancxadebaze uaris Tqmis, aramed

safuZvels warmoadgenda.

mopasuxe administraciul organos

bamisad, arc gancxadebisTvis daudgenia

anazRaureba moiTxova.  


Tbilisis saqalaqo sasamarTlos 


administraciul saqmeTa kolegiis 


2008 wlis 26 noembris saoqmo 


ganCinebiT saqarTvelos soflis 


meurneobis saministros sursaTis 


uvneblobis, veterinariisa da 


mcenareTa dacvis erovnuli samsaxur


is sarCeli mopasuxe – i/m “k. b-


vilis” mimarT, xelSekrulebiT naki


sri zianis da pirgasamtexlos 


anazRaurebis Taobaze, gansaxilvelad gadaedzavna gardabnis raionul 


sasamarTlos. 


280 


2009 wlis 8 maiss gardabnis raionul sasamarTloSi saqarTvelos 


soflis meurneobis saministros saxe


lmwifo saqveuwyebo dawesebuleba - 


sursaTis uvneblobis, veterinariis


a da mcenareTa dacvis erovnulma 


samsaxurma waradgina dazustebuli sarCeli da miuTiTa moTxovnis 


samarTlebriv safuZvlebze. kerZod, ganmarta, rom mxareTa Soris 2007 


wlis 12 martis #79 xelSekruleba 


dadebuli iyo urTierTSeTanxmebiT 


saqarTvelos samoqalaqo kodeqsis 328-e muxliT gaTvaliswinebuli 


formiT, sadac mxareebi SeTanxmdnen 


yvela arsebiT pirobaze. i/m `k. b-


Svilma” ikisra ra valdebuleba srulad Seesrulebina xelSekrulebiT 


nakisri valdebulebebi, ar Seasrula


 igi jerovnad, keTilsindisierad, 


daTqmul dros, srulad da zedmiwevni


T. Sesabamisad, Semsyidvelma 


organizaciam i/m `k. b-Svilis” mier nakisri valdebulebebi 


Seusruleblad CaTvala valdebulebis darRvevis gamo. erovnulma 


samsaxurma miuTiTa samoqalaqo kodeqs


is 394-e muxlis pirvel nawilze 


da ganmarta, rom xelSekrule


biT nakisri valdebulebebis

ver moiZebna siiT warmodgenili s


uladoba da misi mepatrone (sof. ... 


225 suli msxvilfexa pirutyvi).

saapelacio sasamarTlom miuT


iTa saqarTvelos samoqalaqo 


saproceso kodeqsis 377-e, 393-e, 394-e muxlebsa da 390-e muxlis “g” 


qvepunqtze da miiCnia, rom gard


abnis raionulma sasamarTlom saqme 


ganixila uxeSi saproceso darRvevebis 


gareSe, amasTan, sworad daadgina 


saqmis faqtobrivi garemoebebi da


 arsebiTad swori samarTlebrivi

saapelacio sasama


rTlom gaiziara 


pirveli instanciis sasamarTlos Se


fasebebi da daskvnebi saqmis 


faqtobriv da samarTlebriv sakiTxebTa


n dakavSirebiT da miuTiTa maTze. 


Tbilisis saapelacio sasamarT


los administraciul saqmeTa 


palatis 2010 wlis 1 ivlisis ganC


ineba sakasacio wesiT gaasaCivra 


saqarTvelos soflis meurneobis sami


nistros saxelmwifo saqveuwyebo 


dawesebuleba - sursaTis uvneblobis, 


veterinariisa da mcenareTa dacvis 


erovnulma samsaxurma, romelmac gasa


Civrebuli ganCinebis gauqmeba da 


axali gadawyvetilebiT sarCel


is dakmayofileba moiTxova. 


kasatori ar daeTanxma sasamarTlo


s mosazrebas imis Taobaze, rom 


mosarCelem ver daasabuTa zianis arse


bobis faqti da odenoba. aseve imas, 


rom mas ar gaaCnda pirgasamtexlos


 dakisrebis moTxovnis ufleba, 


vinaidan ar dasturdeboda xelS


ekrulebis Seusruleblobis faqti,

xolo valdebulebis arajerovan


i SesrulebisaTvis mxareebi 


pirgasamtexlos gadaxdis valdebulebaze ar SeTa


nxmebulan.

bi gaweril iqna xelSekrulebis

ur pirobebSi punqtobrivad. E 


kasatoris ganmartebiT, erovnuli

mier momsaxurebis Semowmebis Sedegad i/m `k. b-Svilis” mier

inspeqtirebis jgufma Sesrulebis ko


ntroli ganaxorciela SerCeviTi 


wesiT. dokumentaluri reviziis Sedegad dadginda, rom i/m `k. b-Svils” 


darRveuli hqonda dokumentaciis wa


rmoebis wesi, aqtebSi miTiTebuli 


suladoba ar emTxveva saxelobiT si


ebSi naCveneb suladobas. saxelobiT 


siebs aklda pirutyvis mepatroneTa xe


lmowerebi, xSir SemTxvevaSi ar 


iyo miTiTebuli acrili cxovelis sa


xeoba, gadakeTebuli iyo TariRebi. 


adgilze inspeqtirebisas dadginda, rom i/m `k. b-Svilis” mier 


vaqcinaciis amsaxvel dokumentaciaSi asaxuli monacemebi ar emTxveoda 


realurad arsebul mdgomareobas. Mm


is mier dokumentaciaSi naCvenebi 


pirutyvis suladoba gazrdili iyo,


 naCvenebi iyo vaqc


inis araswori 


xarjva, darRveuli iyo momsaxurebis 


miwodebis vadebi cofze, jilexze 


da brucelozze si


sxlis aRebaze.  


kasatoris mosazrebiT, xelSekr


ulebiT nakisri valdebuleba 


Seusrulebelia da aRniSnuli momsax


urebis amsaxveli dokumentacia 


Semsyidvel organizaciaSi ar aris 


wardgenili. darRveulia momsaxurebis 


moculoba. aRniSnulidan gamomdinare, 


i/m `k. b-Svilis” mier darRveuli 


iyo xelSekrulebiT aRebuli yvela valdebuleba, rac Semsyidveli 


organizaciis mier CaiTvala 


valdebulebis Seusruleblad.  


kasatori miiCnevs, rom sasamarT


lom arasworad ganmarta kanoni, 


kerZod, samoqalaqo kodeqsis 361-e, 39


4-e, 412-e, 416-e da 417-e muxlebi.

ovnuli samsaxuri ver adasturebda 


faqtobrivad damdgar zians. kasatori

gamoxatulia i/m `k. b-SvilisaTvis” ga


dacemuli vaqcinebis RirebulebiT.

nxorcielda saxelmwifo biujetis

i o   n a w i l i : 


     sakasacio sasamarTlo saqmis Seswavlis, sakasacio saCivris

l-Svilis sakuTrebis uflebis aRdgenas).

yofis romeli RonisZiebis gatareba 


miaCnia mosarCeles aucileblad

yofis Sesaxeb. amdenad, aRniSnuli 


muxlis analizidan gamomdinare, sa

uzrunvelyofis RonisZiebis gamoyenebis

yofis RonisZiebi

gaZnelebis TvalsazrisiT.

samarTlos mier

mniSvnelovani saproceso darRveviT 


da arsebobs varaudi, rom mas

qmis ganxilvis Sedegze.  


     sakasacio sasamarTlo miiCnevs, rom warmodgenili sakasacio 


saCivari ar aris dasaSvebi saqa


rTvelos administraciuli saproceso 


kodeqsis 34-e muxlis me-3 nawili


T gaTvaliswinebuli arc erTi zemoT 


miTiTebuli safuZvliT.  


kasatori ver asabuTebs saapel


acio sasamarTlos mier saqmis 


ganxilvas mniSvnelovani saproceso 


darRveviT. kasatori sakasacio 


saCivarSi ver aqarwylebs saapelacio sasamarTlos mier dadgenil 


faqtobriv garemoebebsa da daskvnebs.  


sakasacio saCivari ar aris dasa

ganCinebis sakasacio sasamarTlo


s damkvidrebuli praqtikisagan 


gansxvavebis arsebobis safuZv


liT. saapelacio sasamarTlos 


gasaCivrebuli ganCineba ar ewinaa

saqarTvelos uzenaesi sasamarTlos 


manamde arsebul praqtikas.  


     amasTan, sakasacio saCivris 


ganxilvisa da saka


sacio sasamarTlos 


mier saqmeze axali gadawyvetilebis 


miRebis saWiroeba ar arsebobs arc 


samarTlis ganviTarebisa da erTg


varovani sasamarTlo praqtikis 


Camoyalibebis aucileblobis TvalsazrisiT. 


 amdenad, sakasacio sasamarTlo 


miiCnevs, rom mocemul saqmes ar 


gaaCnia araviTari principuli mniSv


neloba sasamarTlo praqtikisaTvis, 


xolo sakasacio saCivars _ 


warmatebis perspeqtiva. 


zemoTqmulidan gamomdinare, sakasa


cio sasamarTlos miaCnia, rom am

saCivris dasaSvebobis saqarTvelos 


administraciuli saproceso kodeqsis 34-e muxlis me-3 nawiliT 


reglamentirebuli arc erTi safuZveli,


 ris gamoc sakasacio saCivari ar 


unda iqnes daSvebuli gansaxilvelad.

lo miuTiTebs saqarTvelos samoqalaqo 


saproceso kodeqsis 401-e muxlis me


-4 nawilze da aRniSnavs, rom Tu

sakasacio saCivari dauSveblad iqneba


 miCneuli, pirs daubrundeba mis 


mier gadaxdili saxelmwifo baJis 70 procenti. 


     sakasacio sasamarTlo miiCnev


s, rom vinaidan, asociacia “...as” 


sakasacio saCivarze gadaxdili aq


vs saxelmwifo baJi 300 laris

4 nawilis Tanaxmad, mas unda daubrundes sakasacio saCivarze gadaxdili 


saxelmwifo baJis 70 procenti _ 210 lari.

daubrunda imave sasamarTlos. 


sarCelis araerTgzis dazustebis

fondma sabolood aWaris avtonomiur

mdgradi ganviTarebis saminist


ros sarCeli ar dakmayofilda.

2010 wlis 20 aprils T. s-Zem


 sasarCelo gancxadebiT mimarTa 


xelvaCauris raionul sasamarTlo


s, mopasuxis – xelvaCauris 


municipalitetis sakreb


ulos sakuTrebis uflebi


s aRiarebis komisiis 


mimarT.  


mosarCelis ganmartebiT, 2007 wl


is 22 dekembers misma meuRlem T. 


b-Zem gancxadebiT mimarTa xelvaCau


ris raionis sakuTrebis uflebis 


aRiarebis komisias da maxinjaurSi,


 yofili Sps ,,..s” 2100 kv.m miwis 


nakveTze sakuTrebis uflebis aR


iareba moiTxova. xelvaCauris 


municipalitetis sakreb


ulos sakuTrebis uflebi


s aRiarebis komisiis 


2007 wlis 26 dekembris #13 saoqmo gadawyvetilebiT T. b-Zis 


gancxadeba dakmayofilda da T. b-Zes 


sakuTrebaSi gadaeca 2100 kv.m miwis 


nakveTi. aRniSnul miwis nakveTze 


gaica #3166 sakuTrebis uflebis 


mowmoba. 


mosarCelem aRniSna, rom xelvaC


auris municipalitetis sakrebulos 


sakuTrebis uflebis aRiarebis komi


siis 2010 wlis 22 martis #66/s-


346 weriliT misTvis cnobili gaxda,


 rom xelvaCauris municipalitetis 


sakrebulos sakuTrebis uflebis aRiarebis komisiis 2008 wlis 17 


ivlisis #102 da 2008 wlis 25 se


qtembris #115 oqmebiT, ratomRac 


322 


orjer, T. b-Zis nawilSi baTilad iqna


 cnobili 2007 wlis 26 dekembris 


#13 saoqmo gadawyvetileba da saku


Trebis uflebis #3166 mowmoba.  


mosarCelis ganmartebiT, misi


 meuRle T. b-Ze 2009 wels 


gardaicvala, Tumca arc misTvis da


 arc mosarCelisaTvis cnobili ar 


yofila sakuTrebis uflebis mowmobis 


baTilad cnobis Sesaxeb. amasTan, 


T. b-ZisaTvis, rogorc daintere


sebuli mxarisaTvis, mopasuxe 


administraciul organos ar ucnobe


bia administraciuli warmoebis 


dawyebisa da misi mimdinareobis Se


saxeb, rac mosarCelis mosazrebiT 


saqarTvelos zogadi administraci


uli kodeqsis 95-96-e muxlebis 


darRvevas warmoadgenda.  


mosarCelem aseve aRniSna, rom sada


vo aqtebis gamocemisas darRveuli 


iyo saqarTvelos zogadi administraciuli kodeqsis me-60


1


 muxlis me-4 


da me-5 nawilebis moTxovnebi, vinaid


an, dauSvebeli iyo kanonsawinaaRmdego 


administraciul-samarTlebrivi aqtis 


baTilad cnoba, Tu dainteresebul 


mxares kanonieri ndoba hqonda aqti


s mimarT, garda im SemTxvevebisa, 


rodesac administraciul-samarTlebr


ivi aqti arRvevda saxelmwifo, 


sazogadoebriv an sxva piris kanonier


 uflebebs an interesebs. amdenad, 


mosarCelis mosazrebiT, administraci


ul organos unda daesabuTebina is 


garemoeba, Tu ratom ayenebda zi


ans aRmWurveli administraciul-


samarTlebrivi aqti saxelmwifo 


an sazogadoebriv interesebs.


yovelive zemoaRniSnulidan gamomd


inare, mosarCelem xelvaCauris 


municipalitetis sakreb


ulos sakuTrebis uflebi


s aRiarebis komisiis 


2008 wlis 17 ivlisis #102 oqmis da 2008 wlis 25 seqtembris #115 


oqmis nawilobriv, kerZod, T. b-Zi


s nawilSi baTilad cnoba moiTxova. 


xelvaCauris raionuli sasamarT


los 2010 wlis 31 maisis 


gadawyvetilebiT T. s-Zis sasarC


elo moTxovna ar dakmayofilda. 


xelvaCauris raionuli sasamarT


los 2010 wlis 31 maisis 


gadawyvetileba saapelacio wesiT gaasaCivra T. s-Zem, romelmac 


gasaCivrebuli gadawyvetilebis gauq


meba da axali gadawyvetilebiT 


sarCelis dakmayofileba moiTxova. 


quTaisis saapelacio sasamarTlo


s administraciul 


saqmeTa palatis 


2010 wlis 31 agvistos gadawyvetile


biT T. s-Zis saapelacio saCivari 


dakmayofilda nawilobriv; gauqmda 


xelvaCauris raionuli sasamarTlos 


2010 wlis 31 maisis gadawyvetileba da miRebul iqna axali 


gadawyvetileba; T. s-Zis sarCeli 


dakmayofilda nawilobriv; baTilad 


iqna cnobili xelvaCauris munici


palitetis sakrebulos sakuTrebis 


uflebis aRiarebis komisi


is 2008 wlis 25 seqtembris #115 oqmi T. b-


ZisaTvis 2007 wlis 26 dekembers 


gacemuli sakuTrebis uflebis #3166 


mowmobis baTilad cnobis nawilSi; 


T. s-Zes uari eTqva xelvaCauris 


municipalitetis sakreb


ulos sakuTrebis uflebi


s aRiarebis komisiis 


323 


2008 wlis 17 ivlisis #102 saoqmo


 gadawyvetilebis (oqmis) T. b-Zis 


nawilSi baTilad cnobaze.  


saapelacio sasamarTlom dadgenila


d miiCnia, rom 2007 wlis 22 


dekembers T. b-Zem gancxadebiT mima


rTa xelvaCauris raionis sakuTrebis 


uflebis aRiarebis komisias


 da maxinjaurSi, yofi


li Sps ,,…is” 2100 kv.m 


miwis nakveTze sakuTrebis uflebis 


aRiareba moiTxova. gancxadebelma 


sakuTrebis uflebis aRiarebis 


motivad miuTiTa ,,marTlzomieri 


mflobeloba”. amasTan, gancxadebis da


narTad miTiTebuli iyo: sakadastro 


azomviTi naxazi da piradobis da


madasturebeli dokumentis asli. 


xelvaCauris municipalitetis sakreb


ulos sakuTrebis uflebis aRiarebis 


komisiis 2007 wlis 26 dekembris #1

gancxadeba dakmayofilda da T. b-Zes 


sakuTrebaSi gadaeca 2100 kv.m miwis 


nakveTi, rogorc mis marTlzomie


r mflobelobaSi arsebuli miwa. 


aRniSnul miwis nakveTze gaica #316

sakuTrebis uflebis #3166 mowmoba

sakuTrebis uflebis aRiarebis komisi


is mimarTva #1641 18.07.08w. oqmi 


#102 17.07.08w. 


saapelacio sasamarTlom aRniSna, 


rom 2007 wlis 26 dekembris #13 


saoqmo gadawyvetilebaSi sadavo mi


wis nakveTze T. b-Zis sakuTrebis 


uflebis aRiarebis safuZvlad miTiTe


buli iyo sadavo miwis nakveTis 


marTlzomier mflobelobaSi arseboba.

ta, rom ,,fizikuri da kerZo 


samarTlis iuridiuli pirebis mfl

miwis nakveTebze sakuTrebis uflebi


s aRiarebis Sesaxeb” saqarTvelos

wlis 15 seqtembris #525 brZaneb


ulebiT damtkicebuli “fizikuri da 


kerZo samarTlis iuridiuli pirebis mflobelobaSi (sargeblobaSi)

sameurneo daniSnulebis miwis farTze


 fizikuri da kerZo samarTlis 


iuriduli pirebis sakuTrebis uflebis aRiarebis wesi.  


saapelacio sasamarTlom miuTiTa 


,,fizikuri da kerZo samarTlis 


iuridiuli pirebis mflobelobaSi 


(sargeblobaSi) arsebul miwis 


naveTebze sakuTrebis uflebis aRiare


bis Sesaxeb” saqarTvelos kanonis 


me-2 muxlis “a” qvepunqtze da ganmarta, rom marTlzomier 


mflobelobaSi arsebuli miwa iyo sa


xelmwifos sakuTrebis sasoflo an 


arasasoflo-sameurneo daniSnulebis mi


wis nakveTi, masze ganTavsebuli 


Senoba-nagebobiT (aSenebuli, mSenebare an dangreuli) an mis gareSe, 


romelzedac fizikur pirs marT


lzomieri mflobelobis ufleba 


warmoeSva am kanonis amoqmedebamde. 


saapelacio sasamarTlom miuTiTa 


,,fizikuri da kerZo samarTlis 


iuridiuli pirebis mflobelobaSi 


(sargeblobaSi) arsebul miwis 


nakveTebze sakuTrebis uflebis aRiarebis Sesaxeb” saqarTvelos kanonis 


me-5 muxlze da ganmarta, rom 2007 wlis 22 dekembers T. b-Zes 


komisiisTvis unda waredgina, mi


wis marTlzomieri  mflobelobis 


damadasturebeli dokumentebi. mi


wis marTlzomieri mflobelobis 


damadasturebeli dokument


i iyo cnoba-daxasiaTeba TandarTuli uflebis 


damadasturebeli dokumentiT (aseTi


s arsebobis SemTxvevaSi), sakomlo 


wignidan amonaweri, miRebis wign


aki, saqarTvelos respublikaSi 


sasoflo-sameurneo daniSnulebis miwi


s farTobis Sesaxeb. saqarTvelos 


respublikis ministrTa kabinetis


 1992 wlis 18 ianvris #48 


dadgenilebis Sesabamisad,  soflis 


(dabis) adgilobrivi mmarTvelobis 


organoebis gadawyvetilebiT Seqmnili


 miwis reformis komisiis mier 


Sedgenili da soflis (dabis) yriloba


ze (saerTo krebaze) damtkicebuli 


miwebis ganawilebis sia, TandarTuli


 miwis gamoyofis 


gegmiT an mis 


gareSe, adgilobrivi TviTmmarTvelobis


 (mmarTvelobis) organoebis mier 


damtkicebuli sasoflo-sameurneo da


niSnulebis miwiT sargoblobisaTvis 


saregistracio periodSi moqmedi sakadastro sia, sammarTvelos aqti, 


an/da sxva dokumenti. 


saapelacio sasamarTlom aRniSna, ro


m ar moipoveboda monacemebi, T. 


b-Zis mier komisiisaTvis sadavo


 miwis nakveTze marTlzomieri 


mflobelobis damadasturebeli do


kumentis wardgenis Sesaxeb. 


saapelacio sasamarTlom aRniSna, rom `fizikuri da kerZo

s aRiarebis wesisa da sakuTrebis 


uflebis mowmobis formis damtki


cebis Sesaxeb~ saqarTvelos

pirveli punqtis Tanaxmad, Tu da


interesebuli piris moTxovna 


sakuTrebis uflebis aRiarebis Taobaz


e ar akmayofilebd


a “fizikuri da 


kerZo samarTlis iuridiuli pirebis mflobelobaSi (sargeblobaSi) 


325 


arsebul miwis naveTebze sakuTreb


is uflebis aRiarebis Sesaxeb” 


saqarTvelos kanoniTa da am wesiT gansazRvrul pirobebs an 


gancxadebisaTvis darTuli dokument


iT ar dasturdeboda marTlzomieri 


mflobelobis, sargeblobis an/da TviT


neburad  dakavebis faqti an am 


kanoniT dadgenil SemTxvevaSi, Sesabamisi


 odenobiT an Sesabamis vadaSi ar 


iyo gadaxdili sakuTrebis uflebis aRiarebis safasuri, komisia iRebda

 uflebis aRiarebaze uaris Tqmis 


Sesaxeb.

1

baTilad cnobda misi gamomcemi 


administraciuli organo, 


xolo saCivris an sarCelis SemTxvevaSi _ 


zemdgomi administraciuli 


organo an sasamarTlo. 


saapelacio sasamarTlom miiCnia, ro


m T. b-Zeze gacemuli sakuTrebis 


uflebis #3166 mowmoba komisiis 2008


 wlis 17 ivlisis #102 saoqmo 


gadawyvetilebiT marTebulad iqna baTilad cnobili, vinaidan, igi 


gamocemuli iyo “fizikuri da kerZo samarTlis iuridiuli pirebis 


mflobelobaSi (sargeblobaSi) arseb


ul miwis nakveTebze sakuTrebis 


uflebis aRiarebis Sesaxeb” saqarTve


los kanonis moTxovnaTa darRveviT. 


amasTan, saapelacio sasamarTlom ganm


arta, rom miuxedavad imisa, rom T. 


b-Ze saTanado wesiT ar iyo miwveuli


 administraciul warmoebaSi, misi 


monawileobis SemTxvevaSic ki saqm


eze sxvagvari gadawyvetileba ver 


iqneboda miRebuli.  


amasTan, saapelacio sasamarTlo


m miiCnia, rom 2008 wlis 25 


seqtembris #115 saoqmo gadawyvetile


ba iyo ukanono da arsebobda misi 


baTilad cnobis samarTlebrivi sa


fuZveli, vinaidan, aRniSnuli 


individualur administraciul-sama


rTlebrivi aqtiT moxda baTilad 


cnobili aqtis kvlav baTilad cnoba.  


quTaisis saapelacio sasamarTlo


s administraciul 


saqmeTa palatis 


2010 wlis 31 agvistos gadawyvetileba sarCelis dakmayofilebaze uaris 


Tqmis nawilSi sakasacio wesiT g


aasaCivra T. s-Zem, romelmac 


gasaCivrebul nawilSi gadawyvetilebi


s gauqmeba da saqmis xelaxla 


gansaxilvelad imave sasamarTlo


saTvis dabruneba moiTxova.  


kasatoris ganmartebiT, saapelacio 


sasamarTlom ar gaiTvaliswina is 


garemoeba, rom T. b-ZisaTvis, rogorc dainteresebuli mxarisaTvis 


mopasuxe administraciul organos 


ar ucnobebia administraciuli 


warmoebis dawyebisa da misi mimdin


areobis Sesaxeb, rac saqarTvelos 


zogadi administraciuli kodeqsis


 95-96-e muxlebis darRvevas 


warmoadgenda.  


amasTan, kasatoris miTiTebiT, saap


elacio sasamarTlom ar gamoiyena 


kanoni, romelic unda gamoeyenebin


a, kerZod, saqarTvelos zogadi

administraciuli kodeqsis me-60


1


 muxlis me-4 da me-5 nawilebi, romelTa

mdego administraciul-samarTlebrivi 


aqtis baTilad cnoba, Tu dainteresebu


l mxares kanonieri ndoba aqvs am 


aqtis mimarT, garda im SemTxvev


ebisa, rodesac administraciul-


samarTlebrivi aqti arRvevs saxelmwi


fo, sazogadoebriv an sxva piris 


kanonier uflebebs an interesebs. ka


satoris mosazrebiT


, administraciul 


organos unda daesabuTebina, is gare


moeba, Tu ratom ayenebda aRmWurveli 


administraciul-samarTlebrivi aqti zi


ans saxelmwifo an sazogadoebriv 


interesebs.

 sasamarTlom arasworad daadgina 


faqtobrivi garemoeba sadavo miwis 


nakveTze marTlzomieri mflobelobis 


ar arsebobis Taobaze, vinaidan, 


saqmeSi warmodgenili masalebiT 


dasturdeboda sadavo miwi


s nakveTis Sps ,,...is” 


mier T. b-ZisaTvis 


ijariT gadacemis faqti, rac Tavis mxriv miwis nakveTze marTlzomier 


mflobelobas adasturebda.

administraciul sa


qmeTa palatis

saqmis masalebSi arsebul Semdeg 


faqtobriv garemobebze: 2007 wlis

motivad miuTiTa ,,marTlzomieri mflobeloba”. gancxadebas daurTo 


sakadastro azomviTi naxazi da pi


radobis damadastur


ebeli dokumentis

cipalitetis sakrebulos sakuTrebis

ba dakmayofilda da T. b-Zes

baTilad iqna cnobili amave komisiis 2007 wlis 26 dekembris #13

is uflebis #3166 mowmoba (s.f. 26-


33). xelvaCauris municipalitetis 


sakrebulos sakuTrebis uflebis 


aRiarebis komisiis 2008 wlis 25 seqtembris #115 saoqmo

lav baTilad iqna cnobili komisiis 


2007 wlis 26 dekembris #13 saoqmo


 gadawyvetileba da sakuTrebis 


uflebis #3166 mowmoba (s.f. 34-40). 2009 wlis 7 martis sajaro 


reestris amonaweriT (gancxadebis


 registraciis TariRi 22.07.08w)

safuZvlad miTiTebuli iyo sakuTreb


is uflebis aRiarebis komisiis 


mimarTva #1641 18.07.08w. oqmi


 #102 17.07.08w. (s.f. 19). 


sakasacio sasamarTlo miuTiTebs `fizikuri da kerZo samarTlis 


iuridiuli pirebis mflobelobaSi 


(sargeblobaSi) arsebul miwis 


nakveTebze sakuTrebis uflebis aRiare


bis Sesaxeb~ saqarTvelos kanonze, 


romlis pirveli muxlis Tanaxmad, 


am kanonis mizans warmoadgens 


marTlzomier mflobelobaSi an sargeb


lobaSi arsebul, kerZo samarTlis 


iuridiuli pirebis an kanoniT gaTv


aliswinebuli sxva organizebuli 


warmonaqmnebis sakuTrebis uflebis 


aRiarebiT (SemdgomSi _ sakuTrebis 


uflebis aRiareba) saxelmwifos saku


TrebaSi arsebuli miwis fondis 


aTviseba da miwis bazris 


ganviTarebis xelSewyoba.  


amdenad, sakasacio sasamarTlo ganm


artavs, rom `fizikuri da kerZo  


samarTlis iuridiuli pirebis mfl


obelobaSi (sargeblobaSi) arsebul 


miwis nakveTebze sakuTrebis uflebi


s aRiarebis Sesaxeb~ saqarTvelos 


kanoni Seexeba sami sa


xis urTierTobas, kerZod


, urTierTobas, romelic 


gamomdinareobs miwis marTlzomieri mflobelobidan, miwaT 


sargeblobidan da miwis Tv


iTneburad dakavebidan.  


sakasacio sasamarTlo dadgenila


d miiCnevs, rom xelvaCauris 


municipalitetis sakreb


ulos sakuTrebis uflebis aRiarebis komisiam

miwis nakveTebze sakuTrebis ufle

kveTi sakuTrebaSi gadaeca, rogorc 


marTlzomier mflobeloba


Si arsebuli miwa.

saxelmwifos sakuTrebis sasoflo an 


arasasoflo-sameurneo daniSnulebis mi


wis nakveTi, masze ganTavsebuli

romelzedac fizikur pirs marT


lzomieri mflobelobis ufleba 


warmoeSva am kanonis amoqmedebamde.

 miwis marTlzomieri mflobelobis 


damadasturebeli dokumentebi. mi


wis marTlzomieri mflobelobis 


damadasturebeli dokumenti aris 


cnoba-daxasiaTeba TandarTuli 


uflebis damadasturebeli 


dokumentiT (aseTis arsebobis SemTxvevaSi), 


sakomlo wignidan amonaweri, miRebis 


wignaki, saqarTvelos respublikaSi 


sasoflo-sameurneo daniSnulebis miwi


s farTobis Sesaxeb. saqarTvelos 


respublikis ministrTa kabinetis

(dabis) adgilobrivi mmarTvelobis

sakasacio sasamarTlo aRniSnavs, 


rom marTalia kasatori miuTiTebs 


T. b-Zesa da Sps ,,...s” Soris arse


bul saijaro xelSekrulebaze, romlis 


safuZvelzec dgindeboda T. b-Zi


s mier sadavo miwis nakveTis 


marTlzomieri mflobelobis faqt


i, magram aRni


Snuli saijaro 


xelSekruleba Sewyda 2005 wels, Se


sabamisad, 2005 wlis Semdeg 


gamoiricxa mosarCelis mier sada


vo miwis nakveTis marTlzomieri 


mflobelobis faqti. 


sakasacio sasamarTlo miiCnevs, miux


edavad imisa, rom kanonmdebeli 


terminTa Soris axdens diferencireb


as da TviTneburad dakavebul miwis 


nakveTs gamijnavs marTlzomieri flobisa da sargeblobis uflebiT 


dakavebuli miwis nakveTebisagan, yv


ela zemoaRniSnuli terminis saerTo 


maxasiaTebel ZiriTad elements 


warmoadgens flobis faqti, im 


gansxvavebiT, rom erT SemTxvevaSi, 


saubaria marTlzomier mflobelobaze, 


xolo meore SemTxvevaSi _ ar


amarTlzomier mflobelobaze. 


sakasacio sasamarTlo aRniSnavs, mflobeloba aris faqti da imis 


mixedviT, ra samarTlebriv sa


fuZvels emyareba mflobeloba 


329 


erTmaneTisagan gamijnaven aram


arTlzomier da marTlzomier 


mflobelobas. marTlzomier mflobe


lad iTvleba yvela piri, romelic 


samarTlebriv safuZvelze axorci


elebs nivTis mimarT faqtobriv 


batonobas, maSin, rodesac aramarTl


zomieri mflobelobis dros nivTze 


batonoba xorcieldeba samarTlebrivi safuZvlis gareSe. orive 


SemTxvevaSi savaldebuloa, rom pi


ri dauflebuli iyos nivTs da 


axorcielebdes masze faqtobriv batonobas. 


sakasacio sasamarTlo yuradRebas 


amaxvilebs im garemoebaze, rom 


T. b-Zem sakuTrebis uflebis aRia


rebis komisias warudgina mxolod 


piradobis damadasturebeli dokumentis


 asli da sakadastro azomviTi 


naxazi, rac bunebrivia ar adasture


bda kasatoris mier sadavo miwis 


nakveTis marTlzomieri mflobelobis faqts. 


sakasacio sasamarTlo ganmartavs, rom `fizikuri da kerZo 


samarTlis iuridiuli pirebis mfl


obelobaSi (sargeblobaSi) arsebul 


miwis nakveTebze sakuTrebis uflebi


s aRiarebis wesisa da sakuTrebis

cebis Sesaxeb~ saqarTvelos 


prezidentis 2007 wlis 15 seqtembris


 #525 brZanebulebis me-10 muxlis 


pirveli nawiliT, komisia kanonmde


blobiT dadgenili wesiT, Tavisi 


uflebamosilebis farglebSi iRebs 


gadawyvetilebas, romelic aris 


individualur administraciul-samarTlebrivi aqti. 


sakasacio sasamarTlo miuTiTebs im


 garemoebazec, rom saqarTvelos 


zogadi administraciuli kodeqsis me-60


1


 muxlis me-3 nawiliT, 


administraciul-samarTlebriv aqts baTilad cnobs misi gamomcemi 


administraciuli organo, 


xolo saCivris an sarCelis SemTxvevaSi _ 


zemdgomi administraciuli 


organo an sasamarTlo. 


AzemoaRniSnulidan gamomdinare, sa


kasacio sasamarTlo eTanxmeba 


saapelacio sasamarTlos msjelobas im


is Taobaze, rom T. b-Zis saxelze 


sakuTrebis uflebis aRiarebis Sesaxe


b gadawyvetilebisa da sakuTrebis 


uflebis mowmobis, rogorc admi


nistraciul-samarTlebrivi aqtis 


baTilad cnobis ufleba xelvaCau


ris municipalitetis sakrebulos 


sakuTrebis uflebis aRiarebis komi


sias, rogorc am aqtis gamomcem 


administraciul organos gaaCnda. 


sakasacio sasamarTlo aRniSnav


s, rom saqarTvelos zogadi 


administraciuli kodeqsis me-60


1


 muxlis pirveli nawiliT 


administraciul-samarTlebrivi aqti 


baTilia, Tu igi ewinaaRmdegeba 


kanons an arsebiTad darRveulia 


misi momzadebis an gamocemis 


kanonmdeblobiT dadgenili sxva moTxov


nebi. imave muxlis me-2 nawiliT, 


administraciul-samarTlebrivi aqtis 


momzadebis an gamocemis wesis 


arsebiT darRvevad CaiTvleba admi


nistraciul-samarTlebrivi aqtis 


gamocema am kodeqsis 32-e an 34-e muxlebiT gaTvaliswinebuli wesis 


darRveviT Catarebul sxdomaze an 


kanoniT gaTvaliswinebuli wesis 


330 


darRveviT Catarebul sxdomaze am 


kanonis iseTi darRveva, romlis 


ararsebobis SemTxvevaSi mocemul saki


Txze miRebuli iqneboda sxvagvari 


gadawyvetileba. 


sakasacio sasamarTlo ganmartavs, rom xelvaCauris 


municipalitetis sakreb


ulos sakuTrebis uflebi


s aRiarebis komisiis 


mier miRebuli 2008 wlis 17 ivlisi


s #102 saoqmo gadawyvetileba ar 


ewinaaRmdegeba kanons, xolo da


interesebuli piris T. b-Zis 


administraciul warmoebaSi miuw


vevloba mocemul pirobebSi ar 


warmoadgens saqarTvelos zogadi 


administraciuli kodeqsis me-60


1


kodeqsis me-2 nawiliT gaTvalis


winebul iseTi xasiaTis darRvevas, 


romlis ar arsebobis pirobebSi, mo


cemul sakiTxze miRebuli iqneboda 


sxvagvari gadawyvetileba.  


sakasacio sasamarTlo miuTiT


ebs saqarTvelos samoqalaqo 


saproceso kodeqsis 410-e muxlze


, romlis Tanaxmad, sakasacio 


sasamarTlo ar daakmayofilebs sa


kasacio saCivars, Tu: a) kanonis 


miTiTebul darRvevas ara aqvs adgi


li; b) saapelacio sasamarTlos 


gadawyvetilebas safuZvlad ar udevs kanonis darRveva; g) saapelacio 


sasamarTlos gadawyvetileba arsebiTa


d sworia, miuxedavad imisa, rom 


gadawyvetilebis samotivacio nawili 


ar Seicavs Sesabamis dasabuTebas. 


amdenad, sakasacio sasamarTlos 


miaCnia, rom mocemuli saqmis 


ganxilvisas saapelacio sasamarT


los ar daurRvevia saproceso 


kanonmdebloba da am saqmeze miiRo 


kanonieri ganCineba, ris gamoc ar 


arsebobs T. s-Zis sakasacio saCi


vris dakmayofilebis safuZveli.  


sakasacio sasamarTlo aseve us


afuZvlod miiCnevs T. s-Zis 


Suamdgomlobas saqmeze mtkicebulebebi


s darTvis Taobaze da damatebiT 


miuTiTebs saqarTvelos samoqalaqo saproceso kodeqsis 406-e muxlze, 


romlis mixedviTac, davis sagnis Secvla an gadideba, Segebebuli 


sarCelis Setana da xarjebis ga


nsazRvra sakasacio sasamarTloze 


dauSvebelia. imave kodeqsis 407-e mu


xlis pirveli nawilis Tanaxmad ki, 


sakasacio sasamarTlo imsjelebs mxar


is mxolod im axsna-ganmartebaze, 


romelic asaxulia sasamarTloTa gadawy


vetilebebSi an sxdomaTa oqmebSi. 


amdenad, sakasacio sasamarTloze 


dauSvebelia axali mtkicebulebebis 


wardgena, ris gamoc T. s-Zis Suamdgomloba ar unda dakmayofildes da 


warmodgenili mtkicebulebebi daubrundes mxares.

ma sasarCelo gancxadebiT mimarTa 


Tbilisis saqalaqo sasamarTlos ad


minitraciul saqmeTa kolegias, 


mopasuxeebis - eredvis 


municipalitetis gamgeobisa da saqarTvelos 


ltolvilTa da gansaxlebi


s saministros mimarT.  


 mosarCelem sarCelSi aRniSna, 


rom is dabadebidan devnilobamde 


cxovrobda goris raionis sofel ..., 


mama-papiseul saxl-karSi. mama-


papiseuli sakarmidamo nakveTi 40


 welze metia or nawilad iyo 


gayofili. erT nawilSi, sadac idga


 didi orsarTuliani saxli, 


cxovrobdnen mosarCelis deda da misi


 ori Zmis ojaxi colebiT da or-


ori moswavle vaJiSvilebiT, xolo 


meore nawilSi, Zvel orsarTulian 


saxlSi, dabadebidan cxovrobda TviTon mosarCele bebiasTan da 


gauTxovar mamidasTan erTad, xolo maTi gardacvalebis Semdeg mama-


papiseul saxlSi m. T-i darCa marto sacxovreblad.  


333 


 mosarCelis ganmartebiT, sofeli


 ... mdebareobs patara liaxvis  


xeobaSi, romelic 90-iani wlebidan 


Sedioda komfliqtis zonaSi, sadac 


mudmivad Wirda Tavisuflad gadaadgileba, radgan mopirdapire mxares 


osi SeiaraRebuli razmebi idga. osebisagan moSorebiT ki samSvidobo 


jarebi idga. 90-iani wlebidan moyolebuli qarTuli soflis 


mosaxleobas mudmivad uxdeboda cxovre


ba muqaris, SiSis, mkvlelobisa 


da ubedurebis qveS. mosarCelem aRni


Sna, rom es ubedureba ar amyofines 


maT da 2008 wlis 07 agvistos da


trialda axali tragedia, romelmac 


iZulebuli gaxada mietovebina sacxovre


beli adgili da 


Tavi Seefarebina 


TbilisSi, ... quCaze mdebare “...” Senobas. 


 mosarCele sarCelSi uTiTebs, 


rom misi Zmis ojaxebi droebiT 


Casaxlebulebi arian mcxeTis raio


nis sofel werovanis devnilTa 


dasaxlebaSi. vinaidan mosarCele 


omamde mSoblebisgan da Zmebisgan 


damoukidebel saxlSi cxovrobda ca


lke ojaxad, TbilisSi devnilad 


Camosvlis Semdegac registrirebuli


a damoukidebel calke ojaxad, q. 


TbilisSi, ... q. #91 “...”-s SenobaSi


, sadac misi cxovreba aseve sadavo 


gaxda.  


 mosarCelis ganmartebiT eredvis municipalitetis gamgeobidan 


misces cnoba TiTqos is mudmivad ar


 cxovrobda sofel ..., maSin rodesac 


man waradgina piradobis mowmoba, sadac sacxovrebel adgilad 


miTiTebulia sofeli .... amasTan, 


mosarCelis miTi


TebiT, amdeni 


ubedurebis Semdeg mas Seerya ja


nmrTeloba. usaxlkarod darCenils 


araviTari materialuri saSualeba 


ar gaaCnia da verc socialur 


daxmarebas iRebs.

ovreblad datoveba moiTxova.

omikuri ganviTarebis saministro.

lebis kanonier ZalaSi Sesvlidan

lebrivi aqtis gamocema daevala.

     saqalaqo 


sasamarTlom 


ganm


arta, rom mosarCelis sasarCelo 


moTxovnasTan dakavSirebuli 


samarTlebrivi safuZvlebi 


reglamentirebulia “iZulebiT gad


aadgilebul pirTa – devnilTa 


Sesaxeb” saqarTvelos kanoniT, 


romelic gansazRvravs: iZulebiT 


gadaadgilebuli piris – devnilis sa


marTlebrivi statusis miniWebis, 


SeCerebis, Sewyvetisa da CamorTme


vis safuZvlebsa da wess, devnilis 


samarTlebriv, ekonomikur da socia


lur garantiebs, mis uflebebsa da 


movaleobebs. aRniSnuli kanonis 


Tanaxmad, devnilTa aRricxva-


registracias, devnilis statusis 


maZieblis devnilad cnobasa da 


devnilis statusis miniWebas axor


cielebs saqarTvelos ltolvilTa da 


gansaxlebis saministro. 


335 


     saqalaqo sasamarTlom miuTiTa, rom xsenebuli kanonis me-2 muxlis 


safuZvelze, pirs, romelic iZulebuli 


gaxda daetovebina Tavisi mudmivi 


sacxovrebeli adgili da gadaadgi


lebuliyo saqarTvelos teritoriis 


farglebSi im mizeziT, rom safrTxe 


Seeqmna mis an masTan mcxovrebi 


ojaxis wevris sicocxles, janmrTel


obas an Tavisuflebas ucxo qveynis 


agresiis Sedegad, Sida konfliqtis


 an adamianis uflebaTa masobrivi 


darRvevis gamo – mieniWa 


uflebamosileba devnilad cnobisa da devnilis 


statusis miniWebis Sesaxeb gancxa


debiT mimarTos xsenebul saministros 


an mis teritoriul organos, xolo


 amave normis me-5 punqtis 


safuZvelze, saministrom piris gancxa


debis miRebidan 10 dRis vadaSi 


unda miiRos gadawyvetileba piris devnilis statusis maZieblad 


registraciis an registraciaze uari


s Tqmis Taobaze; xolo devnilis 


statusis maZieblad SeiZleba regist


rirebul iqnes piri, Tu arsebobs 


safuZliani varaudi imisa, rom piri SeiZleba CaiTvalos devnilad 


xsenebuli kanonis pirveli muxlis 


safuZvelze. amasTan, aRniSnuli 


sakanonmdeblo aqtis me-2 muxlis me-7 da me-12 punqtebis Tanaxmad, 


devnilis statusis maZieblis, devnilad cnobisa da devnilis statusis 


miniWebis an devnilad cnobisa da de


vnilis statusis miniWebaze uaris 


Tqmis Taobaze gadawyvetilebas, 


kompetenturi sami


nistro iRebs 


gancxadebis miRebidan erTi Tvis va


daSi; xolo samini


stros uari piris 


devnilis statusis maZieblad cnobisa da devnilis statusis miniWebaze 


SeiZleba gasaCivrdes sasamarTloSi 


uaris miRebidan erTi Tvis vadaSi. 


     saqalaqo 


sasamarTlom 


miuTiTa 


saqarTvelos 


zogadi 


administraciuli kodeqsis me-12 muxlze


 da ganmarta, rom nebismier pirs 


aqvs ufleba mimarTos administ


raciul organos am ukanasknelis 


uflebamosilebas mikuTvnebuli im sa


kiTxis gadasawyvetad, romelic 


uSualod da pirdapir exeba piris ufle


bebsa da kanonier interesebs. Tu 


kanoniT sxva ram ar aris dadg


enili, administra


ciuli organo 


valdebulia ganixilos mis ufleba


mosilebas mikuTvnebul sakiTxze 


Setanili gancxadeba da miiRos Sesabamisi gadawyvetileba.  


     saqalaqo sasamarTlom dadgenilad miiCnia da aRniSna, rom 


mxareebsac sadavod ar gauxdiaT


 is faqti, rom saqarTvelos 


ltolvilTa da gansaxlebis saministros m. T-is gancxadebasTan 


dakavSirebiT administraciul samarTlebrivi aqti ar gamoucia. amdenad, 


sasamarTlos mosazrebiT, mopasuxis mi


er m. T-is gancxadebis mimarT 


zomebis miuRebloba, zogadi administraciuli kodeqsis Tanaxmad, 


formalur-samarTlebrivi Tvalsazris


iT, warmoadgens administraciuli 


organos mier mis kompetencias mikuTvnebuli sakiTxis dakmayofilebaze 


uaris Tqmas, rac mosarCeles aniWeb


s uflebas mimarTos


 sasamarTlos, 


misi darRveuli an sada


vo uflebis aRsadgenad. 


336 


  sasamarTlom ganmarta, rom gansaxilvel SemTvevaSi mosarCelis 


sasarCelo moTxovnis ganmsazRvrel


 mizans warmoadgens, mopasuxis 


davaldebuleba moqmedi kanonmde


blobis safuZvelze gamosces 


individualur administraciul-sama


rTlebrivi aqti, mosarCele m. T-


isaTvis devnilis statusis miniWebasT


an dakavSirebiT. aRniSnuli miznis 


gaTvaliswinebiT, am saxis sarCel


i warmoadgens mavaldebulebeli 


sarCelis erT-erT saxes, romeli


c gamoiyeneba im SemTvevaSi, Tu 


mosarCelis mizania dainteresebuli piris samarTlebrivi mdgomareobis 


gaumjobeseba da Tu mxaris mier moTxovnil RonisZiebas gaaCnia 


administraciul samarTlebrivi xasiaTi.


 amasTan, sasamarTlom miiCnia, 


rom mosarCelis mier mo


Txovnili administraci


ul-samarTlebrivi aqtis 


gamocema, “iZulebiT gadaadgileb


ul pirTa – devnilTa Sesaxeb” 


saqarTvelos kanonis Sesabamisa


d, saqarTvelos ltolvilTa da 


gansaxlebis saministros diskre


ciuli uflebamosilebis sferos 


ganekuTvneboda. saqarTvelos zogadi administraciuli kodeqsis me-2 


muxlis “l” qvepunqtis Tanaxmad


, diskreciuli uflebamosileba 


administraciuli organos an Tanamdeb


obis pirs aniWeb


s Tavisuflebas 


sajaro da kerZo interesebis dacv


is safuZvelze, kanonmdeblobis 


Sesabamisi ramodenime gadawyvetilebidan SearCios yvelaze misaRebi 


gadawyvetileba. aRniSnul muxls kide


v ufro akonkretebs me-6 muxliT 


gaTvaliswinebuli normis dana


wesi, romlis Tanaxmad, Tu 


administraciul organos ro


melime sakiTxis gadasawyvetad miniWebuli 


aqvs diskreciuli uflebamosileba, 


igi valdebulia es uflebamosileba 


ganaxorcielos kanoniT dadgenil farglebSi. 


     saqalaqo sasamarTlom miuTiTa, rom marTalia diskreciuli 


uflebamosileba administraciul or


ganos aniWebs uflebamosilebas 


kanonis normebis miznebisa da konkre


tuli garemoebebis gaTvaliswinebiT, 


sakuTari pasuxismgeblobiT, SearCios


 da miiRos gadawyvetileba, amave 


dros, kanonmdebeli avaldebulebs administraciul organos 


ganaxorcielos  diskreciuli uf


lebamosileba mxolod kanoniT 


dadgenil farglebSi da mxolod im mizniT, romlis misaRwevadac 


miniWebuli aqvs mas es ufleba


mosileba. amasTan, diskreciuli 


uflebamosilebisas  gamocemuli aq


ti ar SeiZleba iwvevdes piris 


kanonieri uflebebisa da intere


sebis dausabuTebel SezRudvas. 


 saqalaqo 


sasamarTlom 


miiCnia,


 rom gansaxilvel SemTxvevaSi 


mosarCelis mier warmodgenil iqna, 


misi moTxovnis damadasturebeli, 


rogorc faqtobrivi, aseve samarTlebrivi safuZvlebi. saqarTvelos 


ltolvilTa da gansaxlebis samini


stros mier devnilis statusis 


miniWebis Taobaze aqtis gamocemaze mosarCelis uflebis samarTlebrivi 


safuZvelia “iZulebiT gadaadgile


bul pirTa - devnilTa Sesaxeb” 


saqarTvelos kanonis Sesabamisi muxlebi, romlebic iZulebiT 


337 


gadaadgilebul pirs aniWebs ufleba


s devnilis statusis miniWebis 


moTxovniT mimarTos Sesabamis sami


nistros. devnilad cnobisa da 


devnilis statusis miniWebis, aseve devnilTa registraciis procedura  


ganisazRvreba aRniSnuli 


kanonis Sesabamisad sami


nistros mier dadgenili 


wesiT. sasamarTlom yuradReba gaamaxvila im garemoebazec, rom 


administraciul organos diskreci


uli uflebamosilebis farglebSi 


gadawyvetilebis miRebisas kanonmdebeli avaldebulebs mas 


ixelmZRvanelos sajaro da ke


rZo interesebis proporciulobis 


principiT. arsebul viTarebaSi


, saqarTvelos ltolvilTa da 


gansaxlebis saministros mmarTvelobi


s sferoSi Semavali konkretuli 


sakiTxebis gadawvetisas, sajaro interesis dacva emsaxureba - ruseTis 


agresiis Sedegad dazaralebuli mo


saxleobis mZime socialuri fonis 


gaumjobesebas da am mxriv igi Tanmxvedria mosarCelis kerZo 


interesebisa. amasTan, sasamarTlom 


CaTvala, rom vidre administraciuli 


organos diskreciuli uflebamosilebi


dan gamomdinare ar gadawydeba 


mosarCelis mimarT devnilad aRiare


ba an ar aRiareba da misTvis 


devnilis statusis miniWeba an ar mi


niWeba, Sesabamisad, mosarCelis is 


sasarCelo moTxovna, rac dakavS


irebulia misTvis yovelTviuri 


daxmarebis gawevasTan da aseve misi 


datoveba im sacxovrebel misamarTze, 


sadac mosarCele iTxovs, sasamarT


lo mocemul etapze moklebulia 


SesaZleblobas imsjelos am nawilSi 


sasarCelo moTxovnis samarTlebriv 


Sefasebaze. 


 saqalaqo sasamarTlom saqarTve


los administraciuli saproceso 


kodeqsis 23-e da 33-e muxlebze miTiTebiTa da saqmis faqtobrivi 


garemoebebis urTierTSejerebis Sede


gad miiCnia, rom safuZvliani iyo 


mosarCelis moTxovna da mopasuxe saqarTvelos ltolvilTa da 


gansaxlebis saministros unda da


kisreboda valdebuleba – moqmedi 


kanonmdeblobis safuZvelze m. T-isaTvi


s devnilis statusis miniWebasTan 


dakavSirebiT gamoeca individualur administraciul-samarTlebrivi aqti, 


mosarCelis moTxovniT 


erTi Tvis vadaSi. 


     rac Seexeba mosarCelis - m.

mSoblebs m. da z. T-ebs sofel .... 2008 wlis agresiamde erT

romlebic dakmayofilebulni aria

aranair sacxovrebel farTs. goris

 am soflis mudmiv

piradobis mowmobaSi miTi

a da gansaxlebis saministrosTan

fuladi anazRaurebiT dakmayofil

cxovrobdnen okupirebul teritori


aze. eredvis municipalitetis 


gamgeoba saqarTvelos ltolvilTa da 


gansaxlebis saministrosTan erTad

gadaadgilebul mxolod im mosa

sanacvlod fuladi kompensaciis gawe


vas 10 000 dolaris eqvivalentiT

ovrobdnen okupirebul teritoriaze.

saqarTvelos uzenaesi sasamarT


los administraciul saqmeTa 


palatis 2011 wlis 5 ianvris ganCinebiT


 warmoebaSi iqna miRebuli m. T-


is sakasacio saCivari.

los administraciul saqmeTa 


palatis 2011 wlis 24 martis ganCinebiT m. T-is sakasacio saCivari 


miCneul iqna dasaSvebad da misi ga


nxilva dainiSna mxareTa daswrebiT 


2011 wlis 19 maiss 12:00 saaTze.

    n a w i l i : 


sakasacio sasamarTlo gaecno sa


qmis masalebs, moismina mxareTa 


axsna-ganmartebani, Seamowma gasa


Civrebuli ganCinebis kanoniereba-


dasabuTebuloba, ris Semdegac mivida 


daskvnamde, rom m. T-is sakasacio 


saCivari ar unda dakmayofildes. 


     sakasacio sasamarTlo miuTiT


ebs saqmis masalebSi asaxul Semdeg 


faqtobriv garemoebebze: mosarCele m. 


T-is piradobis mowmobis Tanaxmad, 


romelic gacemulia 2006 wlis 13 ia


nvars eredvis Temis m/r da sar. 


samsaxuris mier, m. T-i dabadebulia 1961 wlis 3 seqtembers, cxinvalSi 


da registrirebulia misamarTze - go


ris raionis sofeli ... (s.f. 13). 


saqarTvelos iusticiis saministro


s samoqalaqo reestris saagentos 


sainformacio-samisamarTo biuros mier


 m. T-ze gacem


uli sainformacio 


baraTiT dadgenilia misi dabadebis 


adgili da TariRi


 - saqarTvelo, 


cxinvali, 1961 wlis 3 seqtembe


ri, gamcemi organo - samoqalaqo 


reestris  saagentos eredvis samsax


uri, gacemis TariRi - 13.01.2006 


weli, registraciis adgili - gori, s


ofeli ... (s.f. 16). amasTan, saqmis 


masalebSi arsebuli eredvis munici


palitetis gamgeobis ... teritoriuli 


organos rwmunebulis mier 2010 wlis


 15 ivniss gacemuli #152 cnobis 


Tanaxmad, m. T-i goris 


raionis sofel ... 1978 wl


idan aRar cxovrobda 


(s.f. 80), xolo 2010 wlis 15 ivniss gacemuli #151 cnobis Tanaxmad, m.

is agvistos ruseTis agresiamde 


ar flobda aranair sacxovrebel farT

municipalitetis gamgeobis ... teri


toriuli organos rwmunebulis mier

aRniSnulia, rom m. T-i mudmivad ar cxovrobda sofel ... da ar 


eqvemdebareba biniT an 


fuladi kompensaciiT dakm


ayofilebas (s.f. 14-15). 


     amasTan, saqmis masalebiT 


dadgenilia da davas ar iwvevs, rom T-


ebis ojaxi, romelic sofel ... mxol


od erT sacxovrebel binas flobda, 


dakmayofilebulia #1095 da #1096 sacxovrebeli kotejebiT mcxeTis 


raionis sofel werovanSi, devnilTa 


dasaxlebaSi. aRniSnuli sakasacio 


sasamarTlos sxdomaze Tavad kasato


ris warmomadgenelmac daadastura.

     sakasacio sasamarTlo aRniSn


avs, rom sadavo samarTalurTierToba 


regulirdeba “iZulebiT gadaadgile


bul pirTa – devnilTa Sesaxeb” 


saqarTvelos kanoniT, romelic gans


azRvravs: iZulebiT gadaadgilebuli 


piris – devnilis samarTlebriv stat


uss, devnilad cnobis, devnilis 


statusis miniWebis, SeCerebis, Sewyve


tisa da CamorTmevis safuZvlebsa da 


wess, devnilis samarTlebriv, ekonom


ikur da socialur garantiebs, mis 


uflebebsa da movaleobebs. aRniSn


uli kanonis Tanaxmad, devnilTa 


aRricxva-registracias, devnilis statusis maZieblis devnilad cnobasa 


da devnilis statusis miniWebas ax


orcielebs saqarTvelos okupirebuli 


teritoriebidan iZulebiT gadaadgi


lebul pirTa, gansaxlebisa da 


ltolvilTa saministro.  


     “iZulebiT gadaadgilebul pirT


a – devnilTa Sesaxeb” saqarTvelos 


kanonis pirveli muxli axdens devn


ilis cnebis definicias, romlis 


Tanaxmad, iZulebiT gadaadgilebul pirad – devnilad CaiTvleba 


345 


saqarTvelos moqalaqe an saqarTveloSi mudmivad mcxovrebi moqalaqeobis 


armqone piri, romelic iZulebuli ga


xda daetovebina Tavisi mudmivi 


sacxovrebeli adgili da gadaadgi


lebuliyo saqarTvelos teritoriis 


farglebSi im mizeziT, rom safrTxe 


Seeqmna mis an masTan mcxovrebi 


ojaxis wevris sicocxles, janmrTel


obas an Tavisuflebas ucxo qveynis 


agresiis, Sida konfliqtis an adam


ianis uflebebis masobrivi darRvevis 


gamo an am kanonis me-2 muxlis me-11 punqtiT gaTvaliswinebul 


SemTxvevaSi. amdenad, kanonmdebelma 


konkretulad gansazRvra da pirdapir 


miuTiTa im savaldebulo pirobebze,


 romelTa arsebobis SemTxvevaSic 


piri CaiTvleba iZulebiT gadaadgi


lebul pirad – devnilad. kerZod, 


kanonis danawesidan gamomdinare, imis


aTvis, rom piri miviCnioT iZulebiT 


gadaadgilebulad – devnilad, ma


s iZulebiT, sakuTari nebis 


sawinaaRmdegod unda uxdebodes Tavisi mudmivi sacxovrebeli adgilis 


datoveba, adgilis, sadac igi Cveulebriv, yoveldRiur cxovrebas, 


saqmianobas eweva. Sesabamisad, sada


vo sakiTxis gadawyvetisas arsebiTi 


mniSvneloba aqvs kasatoris – m. 


T-is mier mudmivi sacxovrebeli 


adgilis iZulebiT datovebis faqtis dadgenas. 


     kanonmdebels yovel konkretu


l samarTlebriv reJimTan mimarTebaSi 


Semoaqvs cneba, romelic calkeuli 


samarTlebrivi mowesrigebis arsis 


gansazRvras da normis Sina


asis dadgenas emsaxureba.

debeli “iZulebiT gadaadgilebul

velos kanonTan mimarTebaSi iyenebs 


cnebas “mudmivi sacxovrebeli adgili

aciis adgili” an 


“sacxovrebeli adgili” da es SemTxveviTi ar aris da igi gamomdinareobs

noniT mowesrigebuli 


samarTalurTierTobis 


arsidan; emsaxureba im miznis mi


Rwevas, romelic Cadebulia normis 


SinaarsSi. Sesabamisad, sadavo saki

mniSvneloba aqvs “sacxovrebeli ad


gilis”, `mudmivi sacxovrebeli 


adgilisa~ da `registraciis adgi


lis~ cnebebis gamijvnas.   


     sacxovrebeli adgilis definicia da masTan dakavSirebuli piris

arCevis ufleba. amasTan, piri ar

     sakasacio sasamarTlos ganmar


tebiT, sacxovrebeli adgili ufro 


farTo mniSvnelobisaa, romlis 


konkretul saxeebs warmoadgens 


“registraciis adgili” da


 “mudmivi sacxovrebeli adgili”. Tu pirs 


SeiZleba hqondes ramdenime sacxovrebeli adgili, amis sawinaaRmdegod 


drois gansazRvrul monakveTSi pirs


 SeiZleba hqondes mxolod erTi 


registraciis adgili da mxolod er


Ti mudmivi sacxovrebeli adgili. 


amasTan, Tu registraciis adgils 


piri sakuTari surviliT irCevs, 


mudmivi sacxovrebeli adgilis arCe


visaTvis savaldebuloa piris nebas 


Tan axldes faqtobrivad cxovrebis faqti. sakasacio sasamarTlos 


347 


sxdomaze mowinaaRmdege mxarem mi


uTiTa, rom devnilad cnobisaTvis 


gadamwyvetia faqtobrivad cxovrebis faqti da ara piris piradobis 


mowmobaSi miTiTebuli misamarTi. amdenad, mudmivi sacxovrebeli adgilis 


gansazRvrisas gadamwyveti mniSvnel


oba eniWeba faqtobrivi cxovrebis 


faqts, romelsac Tan axlavs piris 


neba, rom mas surs mocemul adgilze 


hqondes sacxovrebeli adgili. am


asTan, piris neba - daafuZnos 


sacxovrebeli adgili - uzrunvel


yofili unda iyos am nebis 


dakmayofilebis SesaZlebl


obiT, e.i. pirs unda hqondes bina, saxli an 


sxva sacxovrebeli sadgomi mocemul 


adgilze. piris konkretul adgilas 


mudmivad cxovrebis faqti gamoxat


ulia aRniSnul adgilze Cveulebrivi, 


yoveldRiuri cxovrebiT,


 rac SeiZleba dasturdebodes magaliTad, 


gadasaxadis gadaxdis damadastureb


eli qviTriT, sakomlo CanaweriT, 


mudmivi macxovreblebis aRweris Se


degebiT an uflebamosili organos 


mier gacemuli werilobi

 gansazRvrul adgilas 


warmoadgens mudmiv macxovrebels. 


     "iZulebiT gadaadgilebul pirTa _ devnilTa Sesaxeb" saqarTvelos 


kanonis mixedviT mudm


ivi sacxovrebeli adgili aris piris mier 


sacxovreblad arCeuli adgili, 


saidanac igi iZulebuli gaxda 


gadaadgilebuliyo da ar SeuZlia da


bruneba am kanonis pirvel muxlSi 


CamoTvlili mizezebis gamo. piri ramdenime sacxovrebeli adgilidan 


irCevs ZiriTad, umTavres sacxovre


bel adgils, romelic miiCneva piris 


mudmiv sacxovrebel adgilad. Sesabami


sad, mudmivi sacxovrebeli adgili 


piris ZiriTadi, umTavresi adgilsamyofelia. mudmivi sacxovreblis 


arsidan gamomdinareobs, rom piri iq 


ara droebiT, aramed mudmivad unda 


imyofebodes.

     amdenad, sakasacio sasamarTlo uTiTebs, rom davas gansaxilvel

i sacxovrebeli adgilis gansazRvra 


warmoadgens. amasTan, gadamwyveti mn


iSvneloba aqvs ar


a imis dadgenas, 


hqonda Tu ara m. T-s TbilisSi mu


dmivi sacxovrebeli adgili, aramed 


imis dadgenas, m. T-i mudmivad cxovrobda Tu ara sofel ... . sakasacio 


sasamarTlos ganmartebiT, aRniSn


ulis mtkicebis tv


irTi nawildeba 


mxareTa Soris. zogadi wesis Ta


naxmad, TiToeulma mxarem unda 


daamtkicos garemoebani, romlebzec 


igi amyarebs Tavis moTxovnebsa da 


Sesagebels. Mmtkicebis tvirTi mo


icavs agreTve faqtebis miTiTebis 


tvirTsac. TiToeulma mxarem unda mi


uTiTos Tavis sasargeblod moqmed 


garemoebebze da Tu igi sadavo gaxdeba, unda daamtkicos am garemoebis 


arseboba. amasTan, administraciuli procesis Taviseburebas warmoadgens 


348 


is, rom administraciul-samarTlebrivi aqtis baTilad cnobis 


SemTxvevaSi mtkicebis tvirTi anu mtki


cebis movaleoba, Tu kanoniT sxva 


ram ar aris dadgenili, ekisreba im administraciul organos, romelmac 


gamosca administraciul-samarTlebr


ivi aqti. aRniSnulis Tanaxmad, 


administraciuli organo


a valdebuli amtkicos 


mis mier gamocemuli 


administraciul-samarTlebrivi aqti


s kanoniereba da warudginos 


sasamarTlos amis damadasturebeli yvela mtkicebuleba. mtkicebis 


tvirTis administraciuli 


organosaTvis dakisreba 


ar unda ganimartos 


arasworad, ise rogorc misi proc


esualuri mowinaaRmdege mxaris - 


mosarCelis gaTavisufleba sarCelis


 dasabuTebis valdebulebisagan. 


sakasacio sasamarTlo miuTiTeb


s, rom kanonmdeblis mier 


administraciuli organosaTvis da


kisrebuli mtkicebis tvirTi ar 


gulisxmobs mosarCelis gaTavi


suflebas sasarCelo moTxovnis 


dasabuTebisa da mtkicebulebaTa wa


rmodgenisagan. sasarCelo moTxovna 


mosarCelem unda daasabuTos. 


     sakasacio sasamarTlo aRniSnav


s, rom kasatoris – m. T-is mier ver 


iqna warmodgenili misi moTxovnis 


damadasturebeli rogorc faqtobrivi, 


aseve, samarTlebrivi safuZvlebi; 


kasatori mxaris mier ar aris 


warmodgenili raime mtkicebuleba


, romelic daadasturebda goris 


raionis sofel ... misi mu


dmivad cxovrebis faqts. kasatori apelirebs 


piradobis mowmobaSi dafiqsirebuli 


sacxovrebeli misamarTiT, romelic 


sakasacio sasamarTlos mosazrebiT, ca


lsaxad ar miuTiTebs piris mudmiv 


sacxovrebel adgilze, im mosazrebidan


 gamomdinare, rom pirs SeiZleba 


hqondes ramdenime sacxovrebeli adgili da sakuTari arCevaniT 


registracia gaiaros erT-erTi maTganis mixedviT, romelic SeiZleba 


sulac ar warmoadgendes mis mudmiv sacxovrebel adgils. sakasacio 


sasamarTlos miTiTebiT, marTalia, 


m. T-i dabadebulia goris raionis 


sofel ... da man skolac sofel ... daamTavra, magram, saqmis masalebSi 


arsebuli eredvis muni

wlidan aRar cxovrobda (s.f. 80),

eredvis 


municipalitetis gamgeobis warmomad


genelma aRniSna, rom maT iZulebiT 


gadaadgilebul pirTa aRwera daevala,


 ris safuZvelzec municipalitetma 


moaxdina konfliqtis zonaSi mudmivi macxovreblebis aRwera.  aRweris 


Sedegad dadasturda, rom m. T-is mudm


iv sacxovrebel adgils sofeli ... 


ar warmoadgenda. amasTan, mopasuxis 


- eredvis municipa


litetis gamgeobis 


349 


mier warmodgenili sakomlo wignis 


Canaweris mixedviT, dadasturda, rom 


sakomlo wignSi rigiT #27 ojaxad re


gistrirebulia m. T-uri da z. T-


uri, xolo mosarCele m. T-i ar aris


 registrirebuli. agreTve, eredvis 


municipalitetis gamgeobis mier saqm


is masalebSi warmodgenilia sxva 


pirovnebebTan mimarTebaSi formis ni


muSebi, romliTac 


ganisazRvreboda 


da dgindeboda piris konkretul adgilze mudmivad cxovrebis faqti. 


     amdenad, administraciulma or


ganom saqmis masalebSi warmodgenili 


mtkicebulebebiT daasabuTa sadavo aq


tebis kanoniereba, xolo kasatorma 


mxarem ver SeZlo warmoedgina dasabuTebuli sakasacio pretenzia, 


romelic gaabaTilebda mowinaaRmdeg


e mxaris dasabuTebas.     


     amasTan, 


sakasacio 


sasamarTlo 


iziarebs 


kasatoris 


mosazrebas 


imasTan dakavSirebiT, rom sacxovrebe


li adgilis arCeva


 damokidebulia 


piris nebaze da ara romelime saxelm


wifo organos gadawyvetilebaze da 


aRniSnavs, rom kasatorma – m.


 T-ma ara iZulebiT, kanoniT 


gaTvaliswinebuli mizezebis gamo, 


aramed swored sakuTari nebiT, 


sacxovrebeli adgilis Tavisuflad


 arCevis principis safuZvelze 


gadawyvita daetovebina sofeli 


... da sacxovreblad TbilisSi 


gadasuliyo. amiT ikargeba devnilad


 cnobis meore savaldebulo piroba 


– iZulebiT gadaadgilebis faqti. 


     yovelive zemoaRniSnulidan gamomdinare, sakasacio sasamarTlo 


miiCnevs, rom saqmis masalebiT ar 


dasturdeba kasatoris – m. T-is 


iZulebiT gadaadgilebul pirad – devn


ilad cnobis kanoniT dadgenili 


savaldebulo piroba - mudmivi 


sacxovrebeli adgilis iZulebiT 


datovebis faqti; ar aris warmodgenili saTanado mtkicebulebebi, 


romlebic daadasturebda kasatoris moTxovnis safuZvlianobas. 


Sesabamisad, masze ver gavrceldeb


a devnilad cnobis samarTlebrivi 


safuZvlebi.

sasamarTlo 


aRni


Snavs, rom arc saqmis masalebidan 


gamomdinareobs da arc kasatoris mi


er sakasacio sasamarTlos sxdomebze 


iqna dasabuTebuli sadavo - ered

     amdenad, sakasacio sasamarT


lo Tvlis, rom m.


 T-is sakasacio 


saCivari usafuZvloa da ar unda da


kmayofildes, radgan gasaCivrebuli 


ganCineba arsebiTad sworia, ar arse


bobs misi gauqmebis samarTlebrivi 


safuZveli da igi datovebul unda iqnes ucvlelad.

350 


sakasacio sasamarTlom ixelmZRvanela saqarTvelos

saqarTvelos samoqalaqo saproces


o kodeqsis 410-e muxliT da

2. ucvlelad darCes Tbilis


is saapelacio sasamarTlos 


administraciul saqmeTa 


palatis 2010 wlis 7 oqtombris ganCineba;

ineba sabolooa da ar saCivrdeba.

axurma da Tbilisis regionalurma 


centrma. 


Tbilisis saapelacio sasamarT


los administraciul saqmeTa 


palatis 26.01.11w. ganCinebiT saqarT


velos finansTa saministros, ssip 


Semosavlebis samsaxuris da ssip Semosavlebis samsaxuris Tbilisis 


regionaluri centris saapelacio saCi


vrebi ar dakmayofilda, ucvlelad 


darCa Tbilisis saqalaqo sasamarTlos administraciul saqmeTa kolegiis 


24.11.10w. gadawyvetileba. 


Tbilisis saapelacio sasamarT


los administraciul saqmeTa 


palatis 26.01.11w. ganCineba sa


kasacio wesiT gaasaCivres ssip 


Semosavlebis samsaxurma, Tbilisis regionalurma centrma da 


saqarTvelos finansTa saministrom,


 romlebmac aRniSnuli ganCinebis 


gauqmeba da mosarCelisaTvis sasa


rCelo gancxadebis dakmayofilebaze 


uaris Tqma moiTxoves 


s a m o t i v a c i 


o   n a w i l i : 


sakasacio sasamarTlo gasaCivrebuli


 ganCinebis gacnobis, sakasacio 


saCivrebis safuZvlianobis Semowmebis


 Sedegad miiCnevs, rom saqarTvelos 


finansTa saministros, ssip Semosavlebis samsaxurisa da Tbilisis 


regionaluri centris sakasacio sa


Civrebi dauSveblad unda iqnes 


cnobili Semdeg garemoebaTa gamo: 


sakasacio sasamarTlos miaCnia, 


rom saapelacio sasamarTlom saqme 


ganixila arsebiTi pr


ocesualuri darRvevebis gareSe da saqmeze 


arsebiTad swori gadawyvetilebaa mi


Rebuli. mocemuli saqme ar aris 


mniSvnelovani samarTlis ganviTareb


isa da erTgvarovani sasamarTlo 


praqtikis CamoyalibebisaTvis. 


 sakasacio sasamarTlos miaCnia,


 rom mocemul SemTxvevaSi ar 


arsebobs saapelacio sasamarTlos 


mier gamoyenebuli saproceso da 


materialuri samarTlis normebis ganmartebisa da samarTlis 


ganviTarebis mizniT, sakasacio sasa


marTlos mier zogadi mniSvnelobis 


mqone saxelmZRvanelo da sarekomend


acio gadawyvetilebis gamotanis 


faqtobrivi saWiroeba. 


 sakasacio sasamarTlos mosazreb


iT, aRniSnul saqmes ar gaaCnia 


principuli mniSvneloba 


sasamarTlo praqtikisaTvis, xolo sakasacio 


saCivrebs _ warmatebis perspeqtiva. 


aRniSnulidan gamomdinare, saka


sacio sasamarTlos miaCnia, rom 


mocemul SemTxvevaSi ar arsebobs sa


kasacio saCivrebis dasaSvebobis 


saqarTvelos administraci


uli saproceso kodeqsis 34-e muxlis me-3 


nawiliT gansazRvruli arc erTi sa


fuZveli, ris gamoc saqarTvelos 


361 


finansTa saministros, ssip Semosavlebis samsaxurisa da Tbilisis

dasaSvebobis safuZvlebi.

s saministros mimarT, romliTac

xelfasis anazRaurebis 


dakisreba moiTxoves.

o   n a w i l i : 


sakasacio sasamarTlo gasaCivrebuli


 ganCinebis gacnobis, sakasacio 


saCivris safuZvlianobis Semowmebis 


Sedegad miiCnevs, rom saqarTvelos 


Tavdacvis saministros sakasacio 


saCivari dauSveblad unda iqnes 


cnobili Semdeg garemoebaTa gamo: 


sakasacio sasamarTlos miaCnia, 


rom saapelacio sasamarTlom saqme 


ganixila arsebiTi pr


ocesualuri darRvevebis gareSe da saqmeze 


arsebiTad swori gadawyvetilebaa mi


Rebuli. mocemuli saqme ar aris 


mniSvnelovani samarTlis ganviTareb


isa da erTgvarovani sasamarTlo 


praqtikis CamoyalibebisaTvis. 


364 


 sakasacio sasamarTlos miaCnia,


 rom mocemul SemTxvevaSi ar 


arsebobs saapelacio sasamarTlos 


mier gamoyenebuli saproceso da 


materialuri samarTlis normebis ganmartebisa da samarTlis 


ganviTarebis mizniT, sakasacio sasa


marTlos mier zogadi mniSvnelobis 


mqone saxelmZRvanelo da sarekomend


acio gadawyvetilebis gamotanis 


faqtobrivi saWiroeba. 


 sakasacio sasamarTlos mosazreb


iT, aRniSnul saqmes ar gaaCnia 


principuli mniSvneloba 


sasamarTlo praqtikisaTvis, xolo sakasacio 


saCivars _ warmatebis perspeqtiva (ix. saqarTvelos uzenaesi 


sasamarTlos gadawyvetileba 


saqme # bs-424-407(k-10)). 


aRniSnulidan gamomdinare, saka


sacio sasamarTlos miaCnia, rom 


mocemul SemTxvevaSi ar arsebobs sa


kasacio saCivris dasaSvebobis 


saqarTvelos administraci


uli saproceso kodeqsis 34-e muxlis me-3 


nawiliT gansazRvruli arc erTi sa


fuZveli, ris gamoc saqarTvelos 


Tavdacvis saministros sakasacio sa


Civari ar unda iqnes daSvebuli 


gansaxilvelad.

e muxlis me-3 nawiliT da

i   n a w i l i: 


z. d-Zem 25.12.09 w. sasarCelo gancxadebiT mimarTa Tbilisis 


saqalaqo sasamarTlos administraciul 


saqmeTa kolegias mopasuxeebis _ 


saqarTvelos iusticiis saministro


s sajaro reestris erovnuli 


saagentosa da Tbilisis saregistra


cio samsaxuris mimarT, romliTac 


saregistracio samsaxuris 11.12.09 w. gadawyvetilebisa da sajaro 


reestris Canaweris baTilad cnoba moiTxova.

14.04.10 w. sasamarTlo sxdomaze mo


sarCelem daazusta mopasuxeTa wre 


da mopasuxed miuTiTa Tbilisis 


saregistracio samsaxuri, aseve 


daazusta moTxovna, kerZod Tbilisis saregistracio samsaxuris 11.12.09 


w. registraciis Sesaxeb gadawyveti


lebis baTilad cnoba moiTxova.

d-Zis sarCeli ar dakmayofilda.

s administraciul 


saqmeTa palatis 


366

apelacio saCivari ar dakmayofilda, 


ucvlelad darCa Tbilisis saqa


laqo sasamarTlos administraciul

s administraciul 


saqmeTa palatis 


19.11.10 w. ganCineba sakasacio saCi


vriT gaasaCivra z. d-Zem, romelmac 


gasaCivrebuli ganCinebis gauqmeba da 


sarCelis dakmayofileba moiTxova.   


s a m o t i v a c i 


o   n a w i l i : 


sakasacio sasamarTlo gasaCivrebuli


 ganCinebis gacnobis, sakasacio 


saCivrebis safuZvlianobis Semowmebis Sedegad miiCnevs, rom z. d-Zis 


sakasacio saCivari dauSveblad unda 


iqnes cnobili Semdeg garemoebaTa 


gamo: 


 sakasacio sasamarTlos miaCnia, 


rom saapelacio sasamarTlom saqme 


ganixila arsebiTi procesualuri 


darRvevebis gareSe da saqmeze 


arsebiTad swori gadawyvetilebaa mi


Rebuli. mocemuli 


saqme ar aris 


mniSvnelovani samarTlis ganviTareb


isa da erTgvarovani sasamarTlo 


praqtikis CamoyalibebisaTvis. 


 sakasacio sasamarTlos miaCnia,


 rom mocemul SemTxvevaSi ar 


arsebobs saapelacio sasamarTlos 


mier gamoyenebuli


 saproceso da 


materialuri samarTlis normebis


 ganmartebisa da samarTlis 


ganviTarebis mizniT, sakasacio sasa


marTlos mier zogadi mniSvnelobis 


mqone saxelmZRvanelo da sarekomend


acio gadawyvetilebis gamotanis 


faqtobrivi saWiroeba. 


 sakasacio sasamarTlos mosazreb


iT, aRniSnul saqmes ar gaaCnia 


principuli mniSvneloba 


sasamarTlo praqtikisaTvis, xolo sakasacio 


saCivars _ warmatebis perspeqtiva. 


 aRniSnulidan gamomdinare, saka


sacio sasamarTlos miaCnia, rom 


mocemul SemTxvevaSi ar arsebobs sa


kasacio saCivris dasaSvebobis 


saqarTvelos administraci


uli saproceso kodeqsis 34-e muxlis me-3 


nawiliT gansazRvruli arc erTi sa


fuZveli. Sesabamisad, z. d-Zis 


sakasacio saCivari ar unda iqnes daSvebuli gansaxilvelad. 


sakasacio sasamarTlos miaCnia, rom, vinaidan mocemul saqmeze T. d-

(samasi) lari, saqarTvelos samoqalaqo saproceso kodeqsis 401-e 


muxlis me-4 nawilis Tanaxmad, mas 


unda daubrundes aRniSnuli Tanxis 


70% _ 210 (oras aTi) lari.
